[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/nyi khri ka pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D9}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_pany+tsa bing sha ti sA ha sri kA pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA/_bod skad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_dum bu dang po/_bam po 
[\[1b.2\]]gcig pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod 
[\[1b.3\]]'phungs po la/_dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig ste/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang du gyur pa/_
[\[1b.4\]]sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_rang gi don rab tu thob pa/_srid par 
[\[1b.5\]]sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa sha stag ste/_gang zag gcig ma 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]gtogs pa ni/_'di ltar slob pa rgyun tu zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o/_/dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang /_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma shin tu 
[\[2a.2\]]mang ba kun kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/_stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/_mtshan ma 
[\[2a.3\]]med pa'i spyod yul can/_rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/_chags pa med pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/_thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/_
[\[2a.4\]]bstan pa zad mi shes pa la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa/_mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba/_mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa/_mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/_le lo med cing 
[\[2a.5\]]brtson 'grus brtsams pa/_lus dang srog la mi lta ba/_tshul 'chos pa med pa/_kha gsag med pa/_grags pa dang /_khe dang /_bkur sti'i sems med pa/_zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/_chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa 
[\[2a.6\]]rtogs par khong du chud pa/_mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/_yid yongs su zhum pa med pa/_bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/_las dang nyon mongs pa dang /_phyir rgol ba 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]rab tu bcom pa/_pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba/_chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam 
[\[2b.2\]]shin tu brtsams pa/_bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/_sngon du smra ba/_khro gnyer med pa/_snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/_pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa/_spobs pa mi chod pa/_'khor mtha' 
[\[2b.3\]]yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/_bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa/_chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_rmi lam dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_mig 
[\[2b.4\]]yor dang /_nam mkha' dang /_dri za'i grong khyer dang /_sprul pa dang /_gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/_sems yongs su zhum ba med pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang /_shes pa phra ba dang /_spyod pa dang /_mos 
[\[2b.5\]]pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/_chos nyid zab mo dang 
[\[2b.6\]]ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba/_rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa/_chos thams cad la dbang shin tu thob pa/_las dang nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/_brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la 
[\[2b.7\]]mkhas pa/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la zhugs pa/_lta ba dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/_kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa/_las dang /_
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/_bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/_chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mos pa/_chos 
[\[3a.2\]]kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jigs pa med pa/_bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[3a.3\]]grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur pa/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba gdab par mkhas 
[\[3a.4\]]pa/_sems can gyi lta ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/_ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa/_yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' 
[\[3a.5\]]yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /_rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_rin chen snying po dang /_rin chen byin pa dang /_ded dpon dam pa dang /_skyes bus 
[\[3a.6\]]byin dang /_skyob sbed dang /_chu bdag lha dang /_dbang pos byin dang /_bzang po'i stobs dang /_blo gros dam pa dang /_'phags pa'i blo gros dang /_blo gros 'phel ba dang /_blo gros mtha' yas dang /_don yod mthong ba dang /_sgrib med blo gros dang /_
[\[3a.7\]]rab tu zhugs pa dang /_mthu dam pas rnam par gnon pa dang /_brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang /_rtag tu brtson pa dang /_rtag tu sbyor ba dang /_mi gtong brtson pa dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_zla ba'i snying po dang /_blo gros dpe med pa dang /_spyan ras 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]gzigs kyi dbang po dang /_mthu chen po thob pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang /_rdo rje blo gros dang /_lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang /_rtag tu lag brkyang dang /_snying rje cher sems dang /_rgyan chen 
[\[3b.2\]]po dang /_rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /_ri bo'i zom dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/_/
[\[3b.3\]]de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas sku drang por bsrang ste/_dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/_/der bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang /_
[\[3b.4\]]khongs su chud pa dang /_rjes su 'brang ba dang /_'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_'phrul gyi spyan 
[\[3b.5\]]gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so/_/de ltar gzigs nas sku thams cad nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/_de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung 
[\[3b.6\]]ngo /_/zhabs gnyis kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/zhabs kyi long bu gnyis dang /_zhabs byin pa gnyis dang /_zhabs pus mo gnyis dang /_zhabs brla gnyis dang /_sku sta zur gnyis dang /_sku lte ba'i 
[\[3b.7\]]dkyil 'khor dang /_sku rtsib logs gnyis dang /_thugs ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo /_/
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]de bzhin du phyag lag ngar gnyis dang /_sku phrag pa gnyis dang /_mgur dang /_tshems mche ba bzhi dang /_tshems bzhi bcu dang /_spyan gnyis dang /_snyan gnyis dang /_shangs kyi sbubs gnyis dang /_smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang /_
[\[4a.2\]]steng gi spyi gtsug dang /_zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ste/_'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad snang ba chen pos 
[\[4a.3\]]khyab par byas te/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig 
[\[4a.4\]]rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/sems can gang gis 'od zer de mthong ba dang /_'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/
[\[4a.5\]]de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/_'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi 
[\[4a.6\]]bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos 
[\[4a.7\]]khyab par byas so/_/sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/_shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/lho dang nub dang byang dang byang 
[\[4b.2\]]shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang /_'od des 
[\[4b.3\]]gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[4b.4\]]'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thon te/_'od zer de dag thams cad la pad mo mang po/_rin po che sna 
[\[4b.5\]]tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/_'dab ma stong dang ldan pa/_sna tshogs su 'dug pa/_blta na sdug pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_kha dog bzang ba/_dri zhim pa/_'jam pa/_ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur ba sha stag kun nas 
[\[4b.6\]]gnas par gyur te/_pad mo de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston pa mdzad de/_de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung 
[\[4b.7\]]gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/de dag lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs su 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing /_de dag tu byon nas kyang 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/_/sems can gang gis 
[\[5a.2\]]chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par 
[\[5a.3\]]rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_g.yos so/_/rab tu g.yos so/_/kun tu 
[\[5a.4\]]g.yos so/_/'gul to/_/rab tu 'gul to/_/kun tu 'gul to/_/ldeg go_/rab tu ldeg go_/kun tu ldeg go_/chem chem/_rab tu chem chem/_kun du chem chem mo/_/'ur 'ur/_rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun du 'ur 'ur ro/_/shig shig_/rab tu shig shig_/kun du 
[\[5a.5\]]shig shig go_/shar mtho na ni nub dma'/_nub mtho na ni shar dma'/_byang mtho na ni lho dma'/_lho mtho na ni byang dma'/_mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'/_dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' ste/_dal bus bags kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams 
[\[5a.6\]]cad la phan pa dang bde ba skyed par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_mi khom pa dang /_
[\[5a.7\]]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad cing stongs par gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang /_mi dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/_/de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /_skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/_/de nas lha de dag dang /_mi de dag dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe 
[\[5b.2\]]rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/_rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[5b.3\]]sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_phyogs mtshams rnams dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 
[\[5b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang /_byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/_mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[5b.5\]]mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/de nas mi de dag dang /_lha de dag dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/_rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag_/
[\[5b.6\]]rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/_zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[5b.7\]]rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang /_mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to/_/'on pa rnams kyang rna bas 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]sgra thos par gyur to/_/smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to/_/sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang 'khrug pa med pa'i sems thob par gyur to/_/gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to/_/dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur 
[\[6a.2\]]to/_/bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to/_/skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to/_/nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med par gyur to/_/lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to/_/ngal ba rnams 
[\[6a.3\]]kyang ngal sos par gyur te/_lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang /_'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang /_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la/_
[\[6a.4\]]dper na pha dang /_ma dang /_phu nu dang /_sring mo dang /_mdza' ba dang /_gnyen pa dang /_grogs po dang /_mtshungs pa'i sems kyis phan tshun sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang /_gtsang ba 
[\[6a.5\]]dang /_nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/_mi dge ba'i rtogs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/_dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde 
[\[6a.6\]]ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/_'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o/_/zhi ba ni dge ba'o/_/dul ba ni dge ba'o/_/sdom pa ni dge ba'o/_/bden pa ni dge ba'o/_/bag byed pa ni dge 
[\[6a.7\]]ba'o/_/byams pa ni dge ba'o/_/snying rje ni dge ba'o/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa ni dge ba'o/_/srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ba 'di ni dge ba'o/_/zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]pas 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma bsgribs pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa'am/_zla ba nya ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ri rab dang bcas pa/_khor yug dang bcas pa/_lha'i 
[\[6b.2\]]gnas dang bcas pa/_dbang po dang bcas pa/_dbang byed dang bcas pa/_lha dang /_lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/_'od dang sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang dpal 
[\[6b.3\]]gyis mdzes shing /_lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang /_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis mdzes shing /_lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang 
[\[6b.4\]]nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang /_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so/_/de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang 
[\[6b.5\]]shar lho dang /_lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/_'od dang /_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis mdzes shing /_lham me 
[\[6b.6\]]lhan ne/_lhang nger bzhugs so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab ri nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad 
[\[6b.7\]]zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing /_lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_dbang po dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa/_zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang /_sku mdog dang /_gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing /_
[\[7a.2\]]lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[7a.3\]]khams 'di'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_tshangs ris dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_dga' ldan dang /_mtshe ma dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de thams 
[\[7a.4\]]cad kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas/_dga' zhing spro ba dang /_yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la nyams bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_
[\[7a.5\]]phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi ut+pal dang /_pad mo dang /_ku mud dang /_pun da ri ka dang /_na li na dang /_sau gan d+hi dang /_lha rdzas kyi me tog ge sar dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi na 
[\[7a.6\]]bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_byug spos dang /_ut+pal dang /_pad 
[\[7a.7\]]mo dang /_ku mud dang /_pun da ri ka dang /_na li na dang /_sau gan d+hi dang /_me tog ge sar dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]to/_mngon par gtor to/_/mngon par rab tu gtor to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang /_snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang me tog chu las skyes pa dang /_thang las skyes pa mang po 
[\[7b.2\]]khyer nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to/_/me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma la sogs pa dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[7b.3\]]ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu/_bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du 
[\[7b.4\]]red de gnas par gyur to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_dar gyi lda ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to/_/mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to/_/rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to/_/me tog dang /_dar gyi lda ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[7b.5\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang shin tu mdzes shing /_lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin 
[\[7b.6\]]du/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/_/lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang 
[\[7b.7\]]steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/_/de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]mthong nas/_'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du/_nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /_shar gyi 
[\[8a.2\]]lus 'phags po dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar dang /_de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[8a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/_/de nas 
[\[8a.4\]]yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du/_'od rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/_yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to/_/shar phyogs dang /_lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang 
[\[8a.5\]]shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab tu snang bar gyur to/_/'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can gang 
[\[8a.6\]]ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[8a.7\]]'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/_sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_bcom ldan 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/_/lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang 
[\[8b.2\]]shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/_sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[8b.3\]]khams 'di na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[8b.4\]]shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas 
[\[8b.5\]]zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[8b.6\]]'od zer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[8b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dogs 'di 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[9a.2\]]chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[9a.3\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[9a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[9a.5\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig 
[\[9a.6\]]pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab 
[\[9a.7\]]par shes na song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/_bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_
[\[9b.2\]]bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la 
[\[9b.3\]]pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/_der nyams par gyur 
[\[9b.4\]]ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong 
[\[9b.5\]]dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[9b.6\]]ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba 
[\[9b.7\]]dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/_bcom 
[\[10a.2\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 
[\[10a.3\]]'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[10a.4\]]mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[10a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to/_/pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug 
[\[10a.6\]]po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu 
[\[10a.7\]]mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /_rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/mchod pa 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod do/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[10b.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi 
[\[10b.3\]]khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[10b.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di 
[\[10b.5\]]lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/_byang 
[\[10b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[10b.7\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom 
[\[11a.2\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so 
[\[11a.3\]]yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab 
[\[11a.4\]]par shes na song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[11a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/_bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste 
[\[11a.6\]]pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/zhes gyis la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[11a.7\]]zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang 
[\[11b.2\]]bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/_me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng 
[\[11b.3\]]ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom 
[\[11b.4\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub 
[\[11b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_
[\[11b.6\]]gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/_bcom 
[\[11b.7\]]ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor to/_/
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/_/chos 
[\[12a.2\]]bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang 
[\[12a.3\]]rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas nub 
[\[12a.4\]]phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs 
[\[12a.5\]]shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 
[\[12a.6\]]'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro gang na ba der song 
[\[12a.7\]]ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phros/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i 
[\[12b.2\]]klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[12b.3\]]rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[12b.4\]]'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[12b.5\]]chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[12b.6\]]gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la/_pad mo rin po che sna 
[\[12b.7\]]tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/_bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/_/
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[13a.2\]]rin chen 'od 'phros/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/_pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang 
[\[13a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[13a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de las/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag 
[\[13a.5\]]khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa 
[\[13a.6\]]dang /_phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_
[\[13a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 
[\[13b.2\]]'phro bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 
[\[13b.3\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/_nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[13b.4\]]snyed po de dag gi_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to/_/pad mo de dag la de bzhin 
[\[13b.5\]]gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 
[\[13b.6\]]gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[13b.7\]]shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 
[\[14a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[14a.3\]]pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 
[\[14a.4\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[14a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten 
[\[14a.6\]]gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[14a.7\]]ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang 
[\[14b.2\]]phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal 
[\[14b.3\]]ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la/_pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las 
[\[14b.4\]]byung ba/_gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/_bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma 
[\[14b.5\]]mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/_bcom ldan 
[\[14b.6\]]'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/_pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[14b.7\]]de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]de las/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[15a.2\]]zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan 
[\[15a.3\]]dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang bsti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[15a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas 
[\[15a.5\]]byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa 
[\[15a.6\]]ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/_
[\[15a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]'das gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos 
[\[15b.2\]]ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug 
[\[15b.3\]]pa de dag gis kyang /_rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/mchod pa byas nas 
[\[15b.4\]]phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[15b.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad 
[\[15b.6\]]do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog 
[\[15b.7\]]mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu 
[\[16a.2\]]gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad 
[\[16a.3\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[16a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[16a.5\]]chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[16a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa gzungs dang /_
[\[16a.7\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems 
[\[16b.2\]]dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la/_pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[16b.3\]]sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/_bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di 
[\[16b.4\]]dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/zhes kyang gyis la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de la bag yod 
[\[16b.5\]]par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal 
[\[16b.6\]]bas rnam par gnon pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang 
[\[16b.7\]]chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba 
[\[17a.2\]]dang bsti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba 
[\[17a.3\]]der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/_bcom ldan 
[\[17a.4\]]'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog 
[\[17a.5\]]bde'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/_bcom ldan 
[\[17a.6\]]'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[17a.7\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang 
[\[17b.2\]]rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_
[\[17b.3\]]bsti stang du byas so/_/mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba 
[\[17b.4\]]yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang 
[\[17b.5\]]dag par ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes 
[\[17b.6\]]pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces 
[\[17b.7\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[18a.2\]]gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[18a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal la 
[\[18a.4\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun 
[\[18a.5\]]kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das pad mo dam 
[\[18a.6\]]pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo la/_pad mo rin po che sna 
[\[18a.7\]]tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la bcom ldan 'das snyun mi 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]mnga'a'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo 
[\[18b.2\]]dam pa'i dpal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/zhes kyang gyis la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i 
[\[18b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[18b.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal de las/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 
[\[18b.5\]]dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_'phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye 
[\[18b.6\]]ma dang na bza' dang /_rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_
[\[18b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[19a.2\]]pad mo dam pa'i dpal/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'a'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag 
[\[19a.3\]]kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[19a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de 
[\[19a.5\]]dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las 
[\[19a.6\]]brtsams te chos ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u 
[\[19a.7\]]dang /_bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /_rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_/bsti 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]stang du byas so/_/mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de 
[\[19b.2\]]na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[19b.3\]]'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[19b.4\]]sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[19b.5\]]gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 
[\[19b.6\]]'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[19b.7\]]po nyi ma rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston 
[\[20a.2\]]te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/_bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten 
[\[20a.3\]]gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 
[\[20a.4\]]kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[20a.5\]]gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[20a.6\]]snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba la/_pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das 
[\[20a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]zhes 'dri ste/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/_pad mo 'di dag gis 
[\[20b.2\]]gtor cig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_
[\[20b.3\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de las/_pad mo gser gyi 
[\[20b.4\]]mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_
[\[20b.5\]]lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang na bza' dang /_rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[20b.6\]]ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_bsti stang du bya ba dang /_mchod pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[20b.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal/_bcom ldan 
[\[21a.2\]]'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde 'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[21a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[21a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag 
[\[21a.5\]]gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams 
[\[21a.6\]]te chos ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i 
[\[21a.7\]]gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[21b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[21b.3\]]de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog ces bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das gdugs dam pa 
[\[21b.4\]]gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 
[\[21b.5\]]'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 
[\[21b.6\]]mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[21b.7\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom 
[\[22a.2\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[22a.3\]]gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas bka' stsal pa/_
[\[22a.4\]]rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la/_pad mo rin po che sna 
[\[22a.5\]]tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun 
[\[22a.6\]]mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[22a.7\]]pa gdugs dam pas/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/zhes kyang gyis la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams der 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/_der nyams par gyur ta re/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[22b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de las/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag 
[\[22b.3\]]khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /_spos dang bdug 
[\[22b.4\]]spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang /_phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang bsti stang du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub 
[\[22b.5\]]sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig 
[\[22b.6\]]tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[22b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa/_bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde'am/_sku nyams dang ldan nam/_bde ba dang dgyes par spyod ngam zhes 'dri ste/_pad mo gser gyi mdog can 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/_/de 
[\[23a.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin 
[\[23a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/_/de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/_pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po 
[\[23a.4\]]bzhugs shing /_'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/_/chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/byang 
[\[23a.5\]]chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang /_rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim 
[\[23a.6\]]gror byas so/_/bkur stir byas so/_/bsti stang du byas so/_/mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/_'jig rten gyi khams pad mo 
[\[23a.7\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/_snang ba chen po de dang /_sa cher g.yos pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi 
[\[23b.2\]]shes pa de mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[23b.3\]]rgyas pad mo'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang /_dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/_de skad ces gsol ba 
[\[23b.4\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas steng gi 
[\[23b.5\]]phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong 
[\[23b.6\]]ngo /_/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/_'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[23b.7\]]pa pad mo'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang /_de la 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang 
[\[24a.2\]]snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas de 
[\[24a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa la/_pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/_gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma 
[\[24a.4\]]stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/_rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/_bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/_gnod pa ma mchis sam/_zo bdog bde'am/_
