[\[46a.4\]]yongs su smin par byas la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje 
[\[46a.5\]]chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can tshad med grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[46a.6\]]bzla'o snyam du sems sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar sems pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis pha rol du 
[\[46a.7\]]phyin pa drug la spyad de/_sems can yongs su smin par byas la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can tshad med grangs 
[\[46b.2\]]med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du sems so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_srog chags kyi rigs me khyer ni 'di ltar bdag gi snang bas 'dzam bu'i gling kun du snang bar bya'o/_/bdag gi 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling rgyas 
[\[46b.3\]]par dgang bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang /_'di ltar bdag cag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/_sems can yongs su smin par byas la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[46b.4\]]yongs su dag par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas la/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[46b.5\]{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can tshad med grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so//_//
[\[46b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po bzhi pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad snang bas rgyas par byed do/_/'dzam bu'i gling thams cad snang bas 
[\[46b.7\]]gsal bar byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa yang /_sems can yongs su smin par byas shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/_de bzhin 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs 
[\[47a.2\]]su rdzogs par byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can tshad med grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_
[\[47a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das shing /_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'thob pa dang /_byang chub kyi lam 
[\[47a.4\]]yongs su sbyong ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung 
[\[47a.5\]]nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i chos la gnas te/_thabs mkhas pas/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das nas/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'thob 
[\[47a.6\]]ste/_byang chub kyi lam yang spyod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sa gang la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[47a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma sems bskyed phyin chad/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni/_snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]gnas su gyur pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod pas/_dge ba'i chos thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /_bslab pa'i 
[\[47b.2\]]gnas lnga dang /_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_rjes su dran pa drug dang /_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong 
[\[47b.3\]]pa nyid thams cad dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 
[\[47b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'jig 
[\[47b.5\]]rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[47b.6\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i chos de dag la sogs pa mang po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dge ba'i chos de dag 'jig rten du byung bas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dag yod pa yin/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dag yod pa yin/_khyim bdag gi rigs che 
[\[47b.7\]]zhing mtho ba dag yod pa yin/_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_tshangs 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs chen gyi lha rnams dang /_snang ba'i lha rnams dang /_chung snang gi lha rnams dang /_tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams dang /_kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang /_dge ba'i 
[\[48a.2\]]lha rnams dang /_chung dge'i lha rnams dang /_tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang /_che ba'i lha rnams dang /_chung che'i lha rnams dang /_tshad med che ba'i lha rnams dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang /_mi che ba'i lha rnams dang /_mi gdung 
[\[48a.3\]]ba'i lha rnams dang /_shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang /_gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye 
[\[48a.4\]]mched kyi lha rnams dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod pa yin/_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[48a.5\]]chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin no/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sbyin pa yongs su sbyong ba 
[\[48a.6\]]lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sbyin pa rnam grangs kyis yongs su sbyong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni sbyin pa kun 
[\[48a.7\]]kyang shin tu dag pa ste/_de yang 'di ltar sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_ci'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhe na/_dge ba'i chos du ma'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/_'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]lam rnams dang /_bslab pa'i gnas lnga dang /_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_rjes su dran pa drug dang /_
[\[48b.2\]]pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[48b.3\]]lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_
[\[48b.4\]]gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi sbyin pa yongs 
[\[48b.5\]]su gtong ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bgyis na brtson zhes bgyi ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub 
[\[48b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_'du shes stong pa nyid dang /_'du byed stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/mig stong pa nyid la 
[\[48b.7\]]brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/rna ba stong pa nyid dang /_sna stong pa nyid dang /_lce stong pa nyid dang /_lus stong pa nyid dang /_yid stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/gzugs stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/sgra stong pa nyid dang /_dri stong pa 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]nyid dang /_ro stong pa nyid dang /_reg stong pa nyid dang /_chos stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/mig gi khams stong pa nyid dang /_gzugs kyi khams stong pa nyid dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid la 
[\[49a.2\]]brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/rna ba'i khams stong pa nyid dang /_sgra'i khams stong pa nyid dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang /_sna'i khams stong pa nyid dang /_dri'i khams stong pa nyid dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[49a.3\]]lce'i khams stong pa nyid dang /_ro'i khams stong pa nyid dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang /_lus kyi khams stong pa nyid dang /_reg bya'i khams stong pa nyid dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang /_yid kyi khams 
[\[49a.4\]]stong pa nyid dang /_chos kyi khams stong pa nyid dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/sdug bsngal stong pa nyid dang /_kun 'byung ba stong pa nyid dang /_'gog pa stong pa nyid dang /_lam stong pa nyid la brtson na 
[\[49a.5\]]brtson zhes bya'o/_/ma rig pa stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/'du byed stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid dang /_skye mched drug stong pa nyid dang /_reg pa stong pa nyid dang /_tshor ba stong pa nyid 
[\[49a.6\]]dang /_sred pa stong pa nyid dang /_len pa stong pa nyid dang /_srid pa stong pa nyid dang /_skye ba stong pa nyid dang /_rga shi stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos 
[\[49a.7\]]gang ji snyed ming gdags su yod pa de dag thams cad stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtson na brtson 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]zhes bya ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_stong pa nyid bdun po 'di dag la brtson na brtson zhes bya'o/_/de stong pa nyid bdun po 'di dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[49b.2\]]phyin pa la brtson par byed kyang brtson zhe'am mi brtson zhes mi brjod de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des gzugs brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes 
[\[49b.3\]]pa brtson zhe 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs skye ba'i chos can nam 'gag pa'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa skye ba'i chos 
[\[49b.4\]]can nam 'gag pa'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can nam/_rnam par byang ba'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes 
[\[49b.5\]]pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can nam rnam par byang ba'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs ni tshor ba dang lhan cig kun du rgyu zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed ni/_rnam par 
[\[49b.6\]]shes pa dang lhan cig kun du rgyu zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed dang lhan cig kun du rgyu zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos gang yang chos gang 
[\[49b.7\]]dang yang lhan cig kun du rgyu ba med de/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir 'gro ba med do/_/rnam par 'gro ba med do/_/'du ba med do/_/rnam par 'du ba med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/_tshor ba'i 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin/_'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin/_'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin/_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam 
[\[50a.2\]]par shes pa ma yin te/_'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de thogs par byed pa med do/_/tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de tshor bar mi byed do/_/'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de 'du shes su mi byed do/_/'du byed kyi stong pa nyid 
[\[50a.3\]]gang yin pa de mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma 
[\[50a.4\]]yin la/_gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te/_gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid la/_stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/_/tshor ba yang gzhan ma yin la stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la tshor ba yang gzhan ma yin te/_tshor ba nyid 
[\[50a.5\]]kyang stong pa nyid la/_stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/_/'du shes kyang gzhan ma yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/_'du shes kyang gzhan ma yin te/_'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid la/_stong pa nyid kyang 'du 
[\[50a.6\]]shes so/_/'du byed rnams kyang gzhan ma yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/_'du byed rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te/_'du byed rnams kyang stong pa nyid la/_stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed rnams so/_/rnam par shes 
[\[50a.7\]]pa yang gzhan ma yin la/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid la/_stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]gang yin pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag cing /_kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med/_rnam par byang ba med la/_'grib pa med cing 'phel ba med pa ste/_de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/_/gang mi skye 
[\[50b.2\]]mi 'gag cing kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med/_rnam par byang ba med pa la/_mi 'grib mi 'phel te/_'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de la ni gzugs med do/_/tshor ba med do/_/'du shes med do/_/'du byed 
[\[50b.3\]]med do/_/rnam par shes pa med do/_/de la ni mig med do/_/rna ba med do/_/sna med do/_/lce med do/_/lus med do/_/yid med do/_/de la ni gzugs med do/_/sgra med do/_/dri med do/_/ro med do/_/reg bya med do/_/chos med do/_/de la ni sa'i khams med do/_/chu'i khams med do/_/
[\[50b.4\]]me'i khams med do/_/rlung gi khams med do/_/nam mkha'i khams med do/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/de la ni mig gi khams med do/_/gzugs kyi khams med do/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/rna ba'i khams med do/_/sgra'i khams med 
[\[50b.5\]]do/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/sna'i khams med do/_/dri'i khams med do/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/lce'i khams med do/_/ro'i khams med do/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/lus kyi khams med do/_/reg bya'i 
[\[50b.6\]]khams med do/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/yid kyi khams med do/_/chos kyi khams med do/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/de la ni ma rig pa med do/_/ma rig pa 'gag pa med do/_/'du byed med do/_/'du byed 'gag pa med 
[\[50b.7\]]do/_/rnam par shes pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med do/_/ming dang gzugs med do/_/ming dang gzugs 'gag pa med do/_/skye mched drug med do/_/skye mched drug 'gag pa med do/_/reg pa med do/_/reg pa 'gag pa med do/_/tshor ba med do/_/tshor 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]ba 'gag pa med do/_/sred pa med do/_/sred pa 'gag pa med do/_/len pa med do/_/len pa 'gag pa med do/_/srid pa med do/_/srid pa 'gag pa med do/_/skye ba med do/_/skye ba 'gag pa med do/_/rga shi med do/_/rga shi 'gag pa med do/_/de la ni sdug 
[\[51a.2\]]bsngal med do/_/sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa med do/_/kun 'byung ba med do/_/kun 'byung ba spang ba med do/_/'gog pa med do/_/'gog pa mngon du bya ba med do/_/lam med do/_/lam bsgom pa med do/_/de la ni thob par bya ba med do/_/mngon du shes par bya ba med 
[\[51a.3\]]do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa med do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba med do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do/_/phyir mi 'ong ba med do/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med do/_/dgra bcom pa med do/_/dgra bcom pa'i 'bras 
[\[51a.4\]]bu med do/_/rang sangs rgyas med do/_/rang byang chub med do/_/de la ni byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med do/_/de la ni sangs rgyas med do/_/byang chub med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa 
[\[51a.5\]]ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ste/_de de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /_gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par 
[\[51a.6\]]shes pa la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mig la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes 
[\[51a.7\]]bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]mig gi khams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi khams 
[\[51b.2\]]kyi bar la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba 
[\[51b.3\]]'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/ma rig 
[\[51b.4\]]pa la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi 
[\[51b.5\]]brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[51b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/nang stong pa nyid la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes 
[\[51b.7\]]su mi mthong ngo /_/phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[52a.2\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson zhes bya ba'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson zhes byaba'am/_mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su 
[\[52a.3\]]mi mthong ngo /_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_
[\[52a.4\]]tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes 
[\[52a.5\]]pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin 
[\[52a.6\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang 
[\[52a.7\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs de lta bus na/_chos thams cad 'du ba dang 'bral ba med 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_stong pa nyid dang stong 
[\[52b.2\]]pa nyid du mi bsdud mi 'byed de/_stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no/_/mtshan ma med pa dang /_mtshan ma med par mi bsdud mi 'byed de/_mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no/_/smon pa med pa dang smon pa med par mi bsdud 
[\[52b.3\]]mi 'byed de/_smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid la 'du ba'am 'bral ba med do/_/mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la 'du ba'am 'bral ba med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang 
[\[52b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos rnams kyi rang gi 
[\[52b.5\]]mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la 'jug ste/_de de ltar khong du chud par byed pas gzugs mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi sbyor mi 
[\[52b.6\]]'byed do/_/de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[52b.7\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs dang sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de/_de ni 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de/_de ni 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' nyid kyang 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed de/_de ni 'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes 
[\[53a.2\]]pa dang sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de/_de ni 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de/_de ni 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong 
[\[53a.3\]]ngo /_/rnam par shes pa dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed de/_de ni 'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang sngon gyi mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de/_de ni 'di ltar sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[53a.4\]]nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed de/_de ni 'di ltar phyi ma'i mtha' nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang da ltar 
[\[53a.5\]]byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed de/_de ni 'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[53a.6\]]bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/phyi ma'i mtha' dang sngon gyi mthar mi 
[\[53a.7\]]sbyor mi 'byed do/_/da ltar byung ba dang sngon gyi mtha' 'am phyi ma'i mthar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/sngon gyi mtha' 'am phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa 'di ltar brtson par byed de/_brtson pa des rnam pa thams cad 
[\[53b.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid 'das pa dang /_mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/de ni 'di ltar 'das pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das pa dang sbyor ba'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod/_thams cad mkhyen 
[\[53b.3\]]pa nyid ma 'ongs pa dang mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/de ni 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma 'ongs pa dang sbyor ba'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod/_thams 
[\[53b.4\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid da ltar byung ba dang mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/de ni 'di ltar da ltar byung ba nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da ltar byung ba dang sbyor ba'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod/_sha 
[\[53b.5\]]ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[53b.6\]]tshe/_gzugs dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/de ni 'di ltar gzugs nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_gzugs dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod/_
[\[53b.7\]]tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du [{]myi [,]mi [}]sbyor [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byed do/_/de ni 'di ltar/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_rnam par shes pa 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba 'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod/_mig dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/mig nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid dang 
[\[54a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/yid nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzugs dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/gzugs nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya 
[\[54a.3\]]dang chos dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/chos nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mig gi khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/mig gi khams nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[54a.4\]]gzugs kyi khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/gzugs kyi khams nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/mig gi rnam 
[\[54a.5\]]par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi khams kyi bar dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/yid kyi khams nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos kyi khams dang thams cad 
[\[54a.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/chos kyi khams nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/de ni 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang 
[\[54a.7\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba 'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod/_sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]dang nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_rnam par shes 
[\[54b.2\]]pa'i khams dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod/_ma rig pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong 
[\[54b.3\]]na/_ma rig pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod/_'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi dang /_thams cad 
[\[54b.4\]]mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/de ni 'di ltar rga shi nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_rga shi dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang 
[\[54b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong 
[\[54b.6\]]ngo /_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/
[\[54b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 
[\[55a.2\]]dang /_lam rnams dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/lam nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i 
[\[55a.3\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar ba rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 
[\[55a.4\]]sbyor mi 'byed do/_/mngon par shes pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[55a.5\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_yang dag par 
[\[55a.6\]]rjes su ma mthong na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sbyor ba 'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes 
[\[55a.7\]]bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_sangs rgyas su mi sbyor 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]mi 'byed do/_/de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_sbyor ba'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod/_byang chub dang 
[\[55b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang byang chub tu mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/de ni 'di ltar byang chub nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi 
[\[55b.3\]]mthong ste/_yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_sbyor ba'am 'byed pa lta ga la yod/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[55b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dngos po 
[\[55b.5\]]yod ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa dngos po med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[55b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam 
[\[55b.7\]]par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa sdug 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]bsngal zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par 
[\[56a.2\]]shes pa bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs ma zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi 
[\[56a.3\]]sbyor ro/_/gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba 'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor 
[\[56a.4\]]ro/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba'am mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am smon pa med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par 
[\[56a.5\]]shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba'am smon pa med ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs skye zhes bya ba 'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa skye zhes bya ba 'am 'gag ces bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs 'das 
[\[56a.6\]]pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs pa zhes 
[\[56a.7\]]bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/rnam par shes pa da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro/_/
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]de ni gzugs yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod ces bya ba 
[\[56b.2\]]'am med ces bya bar mi sbyor mi 'byed do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/spyod pa yang ma yin/_
[\[56b.3\]]mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[56b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[56b.5\]]gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i don du/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/nang stong pa nyid nas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/skye ba med pa stong 
[\[56b.6\]]pa nyid dang 'gag pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag 
[\[56b.7\]]par bya ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[57a.2\]]rnams dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/
[\[57a.3\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying 
[\[57a.4\]]rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de ci'i 
[\[57a.5\]]phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_chos gang la yang tha dad pa'am/_bye brag gam/_khyad par du lta ba med de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa 
[\[57a.6\]]ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/de lha'i mig gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/lha'i rna ba dang /_gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas dran pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa dang /_zag pa zad pa'i 
[\[57a.7\]]ye shes kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' lta ci 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]smos te/_rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mngon par shes pa dmigs pa lta ga las 'ong /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang 
[\[57b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas 
[\[57b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/_/bkur stir bya'o/_/bsti stang du bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng 
[\[57b.4\]]gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o/_/bkur stir bya'o/_/bsti stang du bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o snyam du 
[\[57b.5\]]mi sems so/_/de 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci ston pa de dag thams cad lha'i rna bas mnyan par bya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can rnams kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/_/de dag gi sngon gyi gnas 
[\[57b.6\]]bdag gis rjes su dran par bya'o/_/lha'i mig gis sems can de dag 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dang /_skyes par gyur pa rnams bdag gis mthong bar bya'o/_/sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du mi 
[\[57b.7\]]sems te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]pa'i tshe/_bdud glags tshol zhing nyams bskyong pa rnams kyis kyang glags mi rnyed de/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lhun gyis grub pa dang /_yongs su 
[\[58a.2\]]brtag pa med par 'thun par 'grub po/_/'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu bsal bar 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[58a.3\]]gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung du 'ong ngo zhes bsrung ba mdzad do/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_
[\[58a.4\]]dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_
[\[58a.5\]]dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[58a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po de la/_la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de 
[\[58a.7\]]ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do/_/
[\[58b.2\]]rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs 
[\[58b.3\]]chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_
[\[58b.4\]]shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la/_la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do/_/de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa 
[\[58b.5\]]de dag thams cad kyang /_tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[58b.6\]]ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[58b.7\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /_spobs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgo dag kyang tshegs mi che bar mngon du 'gyur ro/_/skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]par byed par 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan 
[\[59a.2\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_'di snyam du chos gang la la chos rnams la 'du ba'am 'bral bar 'gyur ba 'am/_'phrad pa 'am mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yod dam zhes bya bar mi 
[\[59a.3\]]sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos gang yang 'du ba'am 'bral bar 'gyur ba'am/_'phrad pa 'am mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 
[\[59a.4\]]ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas par 
[\[59a.5\]]'gyur ram/_'on tam mi 'gyur zhes bya bar mi sems te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi dbyings kyi chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa med do/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya ba med do/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[59a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos gang 
[\[59a.7\]]yang chos kyi dbyings dang /_tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos rnams su bye brag tu bya ba mi byed de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha 
[\[59b.2\]]rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/_'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings khong du chud par 'gyur ram 'on tam khong du chud par mi 
[\[59b.3\]]'gyur zhes bya bar mi sems te/_de ni 'di ltar des chos gang gis chos gang khong du chud par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med do/_/de yang 'di ltar de ni chos kyi dbyings stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor/_mi stong zhes bya 
[\[59b.4\]]bar mi sbyor ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[59b.5\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor ro/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang rnam par shes par mi sbyor ro/_/mig dang stong 
[\[59b.6\]]pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang mig tu mi sbyor ro/_/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang yid du mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor ro/_/sgra dang /_dri dang ro 
[\[59b.7\]]dang reg bya dang chos dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang chos su mi sbyor ro/_/mig gi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang mig gi khams su mi sbyor ro/_/gzugs kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang gzugs 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]kyi khams su mi sbyor ro/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/_/rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes 
[\[60a.2\]]pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[60a.3\]]dang /_yid kyi khams dang /_stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang yid kyi khams su mi sbyor ro/_/chos kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang chos kyi khams su mi sbyor ro/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_
[\[60a.4\]]stong pa nyid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang /_stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/_stong pa nyid dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi sbyor ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_
[\[60a.5\]]stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni rnal 'byor dam pa ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/
[\[60a.6\]]sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'ang myur du mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnal 'byor du bya ba gang ci yang rung ste/_de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 
[\[60a.7\]]de ni rab ces bya'o/_mchog dang /_dam pa dang /_phul dang /_gtso bo dang /_gya nom pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni/_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor te/_bla na med 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]pa'i rnal 'byor to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa zhes bya ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[60b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po ni sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don byed kyang /_de 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson pa yin no zhe 'am brtson pa ma yin no zhes bya bar mi sems so/_/bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung ston pa 
[\[60b.3\]]mdzad do/_/bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to/_/bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/bdag gis ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o/_/bdag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[60b.4\]]sangs rgyas te/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings la bye brag tu byed pa med do/_/de ni chos kyi dbyings las chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'am/_gang la sangs rgyas 
[\[60b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba 'am/_gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'i chos gzhan gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[60b.6\]]chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o/_/bdag dang srog dang 'gro ba dang gso ba dang skyes bu dang gang zag dang shed can dang shed bdag dang byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang shes pa po dang mthong ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o/_/
[\[60b.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i phyir te/_sems can la ni skye ba dang 'gag pa med do/_/gang la skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa de/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/_sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/_sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin/_sems can mi dmigs 
[\[61a.2\]]pa dang /_sems can dben pa dang /_sems can rang bzhin med pa dang /_sems can ngo bo nyid med pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa ste/_
[\[61a.3\]]'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor te/_des de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis mnan te gnas so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[61a.4\]]rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par bsgrub bo/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /_
[\[61a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad mngon par bsgrub bo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa ni ser sna'i sems mi bskyed do/_/tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems dang /_gnod par sems pa'i 
[\[61a.6\]]sems dang /_le lo'i sems dang /_'khrug pa'i sems dang /_shes rab 'chal pa'i sems mi bskyed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[61a.7\]]dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis spyod pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/_'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis rnam par spyod pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa'am/_dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la 
[\[61b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de ni/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la/_rnal 'byor myur du 'grub pa ste/_tshe rabs 'di 'das nas kyang chos zab mo 'di dag 
[\[61b.3\]]de la mngon du 'gyur ro/_/de nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la mnyam par gzhag go_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba 
[\[61b.4\]]de dang de dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur te/_de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 
[\[61b.5\]]'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de ni tshe gcig gis thogs pa ste/_de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyang der ma 'dus pa med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 
[\[61b.6\]]mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas/_mi dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul ba yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la yang myur du mnyam par 
[\[61b.7\]]gzhog pa ma yin no/_/de la gzungs kyi sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon du mi 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang khyod kyis de skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa de/_'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[62a.2\]]rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas der 'gro ste/_nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/_nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//_//
[\[62a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po lnga pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pa dag bsam gtan bzhi po la mnyam par gzhog cing /_pha rol du phyin pa drug la yang spyod de/_de dag 
[\[62a.4\]]bsam gtan thob pas lha tshe rings po'i nang du skyes shing /_gal te mi'i nang du skye ba thob nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed na yang /_de dag dbang po rtul zhing dbang po mi rno ba yang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[62a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la yang mnyam par gzhog la/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang spyod de/_de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yang yod de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[62a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yin te/_dbang po rno ba ma yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po nas/_bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/byams 
[\[62a.7\]]pa la yang snyoms par 'jug snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]med min skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags 
[\[62b.2\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang snyoms par 'jug_/snying rje chen po la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thabs mkhas pas/_bsam gtan gyi dbang gis mi skye/_tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'i dbang gis mi skye/_
[\[62b.3\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang na bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yod do/_/de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang yang ma bral 
[\[62b.4\]]bas/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi po la yang snyoms par 'jug_/byams pa dang /_
[\[62b.5\]]snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug 
[\[62b.6\]]cing de dag thabs mkhas pas/_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ba yang yod de/_de dag ni phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes kyang /_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 
[\[62b.7\]]'am/_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye ste/_de yang srid pa la brkam pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi po 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]la yang snyoms par 'jug_/byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i 
[\[63a.2\]]skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug cing /_de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ba yang yod de/_de dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi 
[\[63a.3\]]lha rnams dang /_skal ba mnyam par bya'o/_/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_skal ba mnyam par skyes te/_de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par 
[\[63a.4\]]byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mnyes par byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag 
[\[63a.5\]]thabs mkhas pas/_bsam gtan bzhi po la yang snyoms par 'jug_/byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/rnam shes mtha' yas 
[\[63a.6\]]skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug pa yod de/_de dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o/_/de dag de na yang tshangs pa tshangs chen dbang 
[\[63a.7\]]chen po dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi nang na yang mchog dam pa phul du bya bar 'gyur te/_de dag de na 'khod cing gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon par 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]sangs rgyas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bzhugs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu zhing dong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor 
[\[63b.2\]]ba'i don du gsol ba gdab pa byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas/_bsam gtan bzhi po la yang snyoms 
[\[63b.3\]]par 'jug_/byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes 
[\[63b.4\]]med 'du shes med min skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam 
[\[63b.5\]]yan lag brgyad pa la yang bsgom/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing /_de dag gi dbang gis mi skye ba yang yod de/_de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams bsnyen 
[\[63b.6\]]bkur cing /_de dag tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/_dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste/_de dag der tshe'i tshul bzhin du gnas nas/_dbang po ma nyams pa dang dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te mdun du 
[\[63b.7\]]byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/_gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi skye bar/_de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[64a.2\]]rnams la rim gro dang bkur sti dang bsti stang dang mchod pa byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag_/mngon 
[\[64a.3\]]par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/_theg pa chen po ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang 
[\[64a.4\]]yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag_/mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/_sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs 
[\[64a.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag_/'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /_chos 
[\[64a.6\]]kyi sgra mi grag pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas/_'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing sangs rgyas kyi legs pa brjod/_chos kyi legs pa brjod/_dge 'dun gyi legs pa brjod cing /_sems can de dag kyang /_
[\[64a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun kyi sgra des sems dang bar gyur te/_gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 
[\[64b.2\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams 
[\[64b.3\]]pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang thob nas/_de dag nam yang 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi skye zhing /_de dag tu yang sems can rnams kyi 
[\[64b.4\]]don byed pa yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag_/dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa yang yod 
[\[64b.5\]]do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing /_mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_sems 
[\[64b.6\]]can tshad med grangs med pa'i don byas nas/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing /_de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa bas lhag par gnas pa dag kyang 
[\[64b.7\]]yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing /_de dag byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]lhan cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du 'dong ba dag kyang 
[\[65a.2\]]yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/_bsam gtan bzhi thob pa tshad med pa bzhi dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa dag_/bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /_
[\[65a.3\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis tshul du mar rnam par rtse zhing /_'di lta ste/_bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go_/de dag bsam gtan dang po de las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/'gog 
[\[65a.4\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/_'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/de las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la 
[\[65a.5\]]snyoms par 'jug go_/de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/de las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go_/de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/
[\[65a.6\]]de las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug go_/de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/de las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go_/de las 
[\[65a.7\]]langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/de las langs nas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go_/de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/de las langs nas 'du shes 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go_/de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs 
[\[65b.2\]]mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang du rnam par mnan cing snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[65b.3\]]chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thob pa/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa 
[\[65b.4\]]rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams thob pa/_ting 
[\[65b.5\]]nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams thob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad thob pa dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po thob kyang 
[\[65b.6\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub thob par mi byed kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_thabs mkhas pas yongs su 
[\[65b.7\]]bzung bas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sems can rnams la ston par byed de/_sems can de dag des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub thob par 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod de/_sha ra dwa bu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[66a.2\]]bzod pa yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de lta bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems 
[\[66a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su sbyong ba dag kyang yod de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa bzang po par shes par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[66a.4\]]bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/_bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 
[\[66a.5\]]thob pa/_mngon par shes pa drug thob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad thob pa dag 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i don du 
[\[66a.6\]]spyod kyang /_bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed pa dag kyang yod de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[66a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing /_de dag gi sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dag kyang yod de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa grangs med tshad med pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la 
[\[66b.2\]]gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don du rtag par brtson te/_nam yang gnod par 'gyur ba'i tshig mi smra/_gnod pa dang ldan pa'i lus kyi las dang /_yid kyi las mi byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[66b.3\]]dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas shing sems can gyi don du rtag tu brtson pas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing /_sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gsum po rgyun gcod pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di 
[\[66b.4\]]ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas shing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/_sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar bsgrub cing /_zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang skom 'dod pa 
[\[66b.5\]]rnams la skom dang /_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang mal stan dang gos dang rgyan dang 'tsho ba dang khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyis yongs su sdud cing 'tsho ba'i yo byad skyon med pa yongs su sgrub pa 
[\[66b.6\]]dag kyang yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa lhur byas te/_sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdom pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa lhur byas te/_sems can rnams khro ba med pa dang /_gnod sems 
[\[66b.7\]]med pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa lhur byas te/_sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad la mngon par brtson pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa lhur byas te/_
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]sems can rnams zhi gnas rtse gcig tu bya ba dang /_'dod pa las dben pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/_sems can rnams chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa 
[\[67a.2\]]med par 'god pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lhur byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 
[\[67a.3\]]lus su mngon par sprul te/_sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams dang /_byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la ngan song thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba'i phyir chos ston pa 
[\[67a.4\]]dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul nas/_shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung 
[\[67a.5\]]gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing 
[\[67a.6\]]de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/_de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis 
[\[67a.7\]]thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing /_sems 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par bye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing /_de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag 
[\[67b.2\]]gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/_de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag 
[\[67b.3\]]kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/_mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par byas te/_dbang po gsal zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur nas/_
[\[67b.4\]]de dag lus yongs su dag pa de dag gis skye bo mang po dga' ba dang mos pa skyed de/_de dag 'gro ba mang po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang /_sems can de dag kyang sems mos par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mthar gyis theg pa gsum gyis yongs 
[\[67b.5\]]su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus yongs su dag pa dang ngag yongs su dag pa dang yid yongs su dag pa la
