[\[67b.6\]]bslab par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba thob nas/_de dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba de dag gis bdag mi bstod cing gzhan mi 
[\[67b.7\]]smod pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]bar du nam yang dbul bar mi 'gyur zhing /_log par 'gro ba dang ngan song du mi ltung ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad/_phyir 
[\[68a.2\]]mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du/_nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi gtong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[68a.3\]]gnas shing /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang /_sbyin pa dang ngag snyan pas sems can yongs su sdud pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub 
[\[68a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su bzung ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong du ma la gnas shing de dag la gnas nas 
[\[68a.5\]]sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes par byed de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yo byad thams cad dang /_mchod pa sna tshogs kyis/_rim gro dang bkur sti dang bsti stang dang mchod pa byed pa dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[68a.6\]]bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_sems can log par lta ba'i mun pa can rnams la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis snang bar byed cing bdag nyid kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[68a.7\]]chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/_sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba de dang nam yang 'bral bar mi byed pa dag kyang yod de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par byung ba yin no/_/sha 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams kyi go mi dbye'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[68b.2\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_yid kyi las kha na ma 
[\[68b.3\]]tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems shing /_'di ni lus yin gyis des ni lus kyi las shig brtsam/_'di ni ngag yin gyis des ni ngag 
[\[68b.4\]]gi las shig brtsam/_'di ni yid yin gyis des ni yid kyi las shig brtsam snyam na/_de ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rtsom pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang 
[\[68b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas ni lus gang dang ngag gang dang yid gang gis 'jungs pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/_tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/_gnod sems kyi sems bskyed pa'am/_
[\[68b.6\]]le lo'i sems bskyed pa 'am/_'khrug pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/_shes rab 'chal pa'i sems bskyed par bya ba de lta bu'i lus mi dmigs so/_/ngag mi dmigs so/_/sems mi dmigs so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[68b.7\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa tsam du yang shes par mi bya ste/_de ni gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kha 
[\[69a.2\]]na ma tho ba med pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang /_ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang /_yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/_bcom 
[\[69a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mi dmigs pa dang /_ngag dang sems mi dmigs pa de'i tshe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 
[\[69a.4\]]gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangs te gnas shing /_nyan thos kyi sems sam 
[\[69a.5\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa med par de rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar gzhog na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag 
[\[69a.6\]]pa zhes ngas bshad do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong zhing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod 
[\[69a.7\]]pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]chub kyi lam gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam lus la dmigs pa med pa dang /_ngag dang yid la dmigs pa med pa dang /_sbyin pa'i 
[\[69b.2\]]pha rol du phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /_
[\[69b.3\]]nyan thos kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med par gyur pa de ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang 
[\[69b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/_de ltar chos thams cad la dmigs pa med cing blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam de lta bus pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod 
[\[69b.5\]]cing nan tan du byed pa de dag ni sus kyang thub pa med do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul ji lta bur spyod pa rnams thub pa ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nam byang chub 
[\[69b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs la rlom sems med pa dang /_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la rlom sems med pa dang /_mig dang gzugs la rlom sems med pa dang /_rna 
[\[69b.7\]]ba dang sgra dang sna dang dri dang lce dang ro dang lus dang reg bya dang /_yid dang chos la rlom sems med pa dang /_sa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_mig gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam 
[\[70a.2\]]par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes 
[\[70a.3\]]pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_chos kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rlom sems med pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[70a.4\]]la rlom sems med pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la 
[\[70a.5\]]rlom sems med pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la rlom sems med pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan 
[\[70a.6\]]lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rlom sems med pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[70a.7\]]'jug pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rlom sems med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la rlom sems med pa dang /_mngon par 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]shes pa rnams la rlom sems med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems med pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[70b.2\]]byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la rlom sems med pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_
[\[70b.3\]]dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_rang byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang /_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 
[\[70b.4\]]'das pa la rlom sems med par gyur pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni pha rol du phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba yin te sus kyang thub pa med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[70b.5\]]chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas te/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_ye shes de dang ldan pas nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye/_mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur te/_lus gang dang ldan 
[\[70b.6\]]pas/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[70b.7\]]ldan 'das de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang mi dang 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]lha ma yin gyi nang na/_smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[71a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/chos kyang 
[\[71a.3\]]nyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 
[\[71a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/chos kyang nyan to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /_sangs 
[\[71a.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/chos kyi 'du shes dang dge 'dun gyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/nyan thos 
[\[71a.6\]]kyi 'du shes dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/gzhan gyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/ye 
[\[71a.7\]]shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs so/_/
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du 
[\[71b.2\]]phyin pa mi dmigs so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/_nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom ste/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo 
[\[71b.3\]]bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom ste/_
[\[71b.4\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad dang /_mthar gyis 
[\[71b.5\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/_mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom ste/_
[\[71b.6\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad sgom ste/_
[\[71b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad mi dmigs so/_/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la sgom ste/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/_ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su 
[\[72a.2\]]rdzogs par byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mig lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang /_
[\[72a.3\]]yongs su sbyong ba yod do/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sha'i mig dang /_lha'i mig dang /_shes rab kyi mig dang /_chos kyi mig dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig 
[\[72a.4\]]yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[72a.5\]]sha'i mig gis dpag tshad nyis brgya dang /_sum brgya dang /_bzhi brgya dang /_lnga brgya dang /_stong gi bar du mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong ba yod do/_/sha'i mig gis 
[\[72a.6\]]gling gnyis dang /_gling gsum dang /_gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/sha'i mig gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/sha'i mig gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[72a.7\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas 
[\[72b.2\]]rab tu shes so/_/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med 
[\[72b.3\]]snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha 
[\[72b.4\]]rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 
[\[72b.5\]]rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge 
[\[72b.6\]]ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes te/_lha'i mig de lta 
[\[72b.7\]]bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/_/lho dang nub dang byang dang /_byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /_'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[73a.2\]]po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig 
[\[73a.3\]]gang dang ldan pas/_'dus byas sam/_'dus ma byas sam/_dge ba 'am mi dge ba 'am/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/_kha na ma tho ba med pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 'am/_'jig rten pa'am 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/_
[\[73a.4\]]zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/_zag pa med pa'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med pa dang /_shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas/_chos gang yang ma mthong ba 'am/_ma thos pa 'am/_ma bsams pa 'am/_khong du ma chud pa med pa 'di ni/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub 
[\[73a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[73a.6\]]bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis/_gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba/_gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba/_gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/_gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar 
[\[73a.7\]]ba'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas/_'jig tshogs la 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]lta ba dang /_the tshom dang tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs snyems pa'i kun du sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/_gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems 
[\[73b.2\]]rab tu srabs par byed de/_gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o/_/de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/_'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/_gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/_/de lam de 
[\[73b.3\]]nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /_gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /_ma rig pa dang /_nga rgyal dang rgod pa rab tu spong ste/_gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o/_/gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa 
[\[73b.4\]]ste/_gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ba nas/_
[\[73b.5\]]gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'i bar zhes bya'o/_/gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pas/_'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ma thag 
[\[73b.6\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ba nas/_gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du rab tu shes te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag 
[\[73b.7\]]pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ci yang rung ste/_kun 'byung ba'i chos can de thams cad ni 'gag pa'i chos can no zhes bya bar shes pas/_dbang po lnga thob par 'gyur te/_'di ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[74a.2\]]dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes 
[\[74a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang ldan te/_thabs mkhas pas ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin to/_/dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[74a.4\]]chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/_/bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang /_khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha'i nang du skye'o/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skye'o/_/mtshe ma'i 
[\[74a.5\]]lha'i nang du skye'o/_/dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye'o/_/'phrul dga'i lha'i nang du skye'o/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye'o/_/de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 
[\[74a.6\]]kyis de dag la rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/rim gro dang bkur sti dang 
[\[74a.7\]]bsti stang dang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_byang 
[\[74b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o/_/'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/'di ni nges pa'o/_'di ni ma nges pa'o/_/'di ni lung bstan par 'gyur ba'o/_/'di ni lung bstan 
[\[74b.3\]]par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ste dbang thob pa'o/_/'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa ste dbang ma thob pa'o/_/'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o/_/byang chub 
[\[74b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[74b.5\]]mnyes par byed do/_/rim gro dang bkur sti dang bsti stang dang mchod pa byed do/_/lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song 
[\[74b.6\]]zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/_/rim gro dang bkur sti dang /_bsti stang dang mchod pa byed de/_'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'dis ni mngon par shes pa 'thob 
[\[74b.7\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni bzod pa thob pa'o/_/'di ni bzod pa thob pa ma yin no/_/'di ni dbang thob pa'o/_/'di ni dbang thob pa ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/'di ni smon lam chen po dang mi ldan pa'o/_/'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par 
[\[75a.2\]]byas so/_/'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams legs par brjod pa 
[\[75a.3\]]mdzad do/_/'di la ni legs par brjod pa mi mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'di dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems 
[\[75a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byang chub thob nas tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni tshe dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i 'od dang dbyangs dang dge slong gi dge 'dun ni tshad med par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro/_/byang 
[\[75a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni ldan par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni dka' ba 
[\[75a.6\]]spyod par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni spyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o/_/'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no/_/'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni 'dug par mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[75a.7\]]'di dag la ni bdud yod par 'gyur ro/_/'di dag la ni bdud yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_de ltar na sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes 
[\[75b.2\]]la/_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs 
[\[75b.3\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar ba bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pa yin/_de ni de'i mig ste/_byang chub 
[\[75b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mig de dang ldan pas/_rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba 'am/_ma thos pa 'am/_ma shes pa 'am/_khong du ma chud pa gang yang med de/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med 
[\[75b.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pa dang /_thob par 'dod pas/_pha 
[\[75b.6\]]rol du phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/_nyan thos kyi chos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /_sangs 
[\[75b.7\]]rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu la la zhig yang dag par smra bas dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus par brjod pa zhig du dgos na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par smra bas brjod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mig lnga bskyed pa'o/_/mig lnga po de dag la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[76a.2\]]tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rab tu 'thob ste/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do/_/de ni 
[\[76a.3\]]sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yo bar byed do/_/gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro/_/mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/snang ba dang mi snang ba yang nyams su myong bar byed do/_/rtsig pa las thal ba dang ra ba las thal ba dang /_ri las thal 
[\[76a.4\]]bar thogs pa med pa'i lus kyis 'gro ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/sa la yang gyen du 'byung ba dang /_'og tu 'dzul ba byed de/_dper na chu la bya ba 
[\[76a.5\]]bzhin no/_/chu la yang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste/_dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/_/du bar 'thul zhing mer 'bar te/_dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no/_/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la/_'di ltar mthu che zhing /_'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang lag 
[\[76a.6\]]pas byugs shing /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur te/_rdzu 'phrul des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir/_des rdzu 
[\[76a.7\]]'phrul gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu mi dmigs te/_de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul lam/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/_/de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/_lha dang 
[\[76b.2\]]mi gnyis ka'i sgra thos te/_lha'i rna ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra nyan ces bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/_/de ni 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa dang /_rang bzhin dben pa dang /_rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/_rna ba dang sgra dmigs pa med de/_
[\[76b.3\]]de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par lha'i rna ba'i khams la bsam pa yang mi skyed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lha'i rna ba'i khams mngon 
[\[76b.4\]]du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po drug pa/_des sems can pha rol dang /_gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis 
[\[76b.5\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la/_'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la/_'dod chags dang bral 
[\[76b.6\]]ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zhe sdang med pa'i sems la zhe sdang med pa'i sems zhes bya 
[\[76b.7\]]bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems shes 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes 
[\[77a.2\]]so/_/nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nye bar len pa med pa'i sems la nye bar len pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/kun nas 
[\[77a.3\]]'dus pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rgya chung ngu'i sems la rgya chung ngu'i sems zhes 
[\[77a.4\]]bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rgya che ba'i sems la rgya che ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dog pa'i sems 
[\[77a.5\]]la dog pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/che bar gyur pa'i sems la che bar gyur pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshad med pa'i sems la tshad med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[77a.6\]]rab tu shes so/_/mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[77a.7\]]du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rnam par ma grol ba'i sems la rnam par ma grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]so/_/zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zag pa med pa'i sems la zag pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nyon 
[\[77b.2\]]mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/
[\[77b.3\]]bla na yod pa'i sems la bla na yod pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/bla na med pa'i sems la bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_gzhan gyi sems shes pa des 
[\[77b.4\]]rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med do/_/de ni 'di ltar sems de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/_de ni bdag gis shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang /_rang bzhin dben pa 
[\[77b.5\]]dang /_rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/_gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems mi dmigs te/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par sems shes par bya ba'i bsam pa'am/_sems shes pa mngon par bsgrub 
[\[77b.6\]]pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin 
[\[77b.7\]]no/_/de ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rnam pa du ma mngon par sgrub ste/_sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/_sems brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no/_/nyi ma gcig nas nyi ma brgya dang /_zla ba 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]gcig nas zla ba brgya dang /_lo gcig nas lo brgya dang /_bskal ba gcig nas bskal ba brgya dang /_bskal ba brgya phrag du ma nas bskal ba stong phrag du ma dang /_bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rjes su dran te/_bdag ni de lta 
[\[78a.2\]]bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/_ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rus ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di zhes bya/_kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/_yun ni 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dug_/tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/_de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas/_che ge mo zhig tu 
[\[78a.3\]]skyes so zhes bya ba nas/_de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/_gtan tshigs dang bcas/_ngan rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du mar rjes su dran te/_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon 
[\[78a.4\]]du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/_/de ni 'di ltar ye shes de ye shes ma yin te bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/_de ni bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med de/_'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyang 
[\[78a.5\]]rang bzhin stong pa dang /_rang bzhin dben pa dang /_rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/_gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes mi dmigs so/_/de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyi don du bsam pa 
[\[78a.6\]]tsam yang mi skyed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/_/de ni 
[\[78a.7\]]lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/_sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_kha dog sdug pa dang /_kha dog mi sdug pa dang /_bzang ba dang /_ngan pa dang /_ngan song na gnas pa dang /_bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/_sems 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/_yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba rnams te/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song dang ngan 'gro log 
[\[78b.2\]]par ltung ba sems can dmyal bdag tu skye'o/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/_ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/_yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag 
[\[78b.3\]]par lta ba rnams te/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/_bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i 
[\[78b.4\]]mthas gtugs pa dag gi 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang 'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/_des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/_/de ni 'di ltar mig de mig ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/_
[\[78b.5\]]de bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/de yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang /_rang bzhin dben pa dang /_rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/_gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i mig de lta bu des mi dmigs te/_de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[78b.6\]]yid la byed pa ma gtogs par lha'i mig bsam pa'am/_lha'i mig mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_lha'i mig mngon 
[\[78b.7\]]du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no/_/de ni zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub kyang /_nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thob par mi byed do/_/gang bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang yang mi mthong ngo /_/de mngon par shes pa des rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byas nas/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu 
[\[79a.2\]]spong bar byed de/_zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/_/de ni 'di ltar ye shes de nyid ye shes ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/_de bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/
[\[79a.3\]]de yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang /_rang bzhin dben pa dang /_rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa de lta bu mi dmigs so/_/de ni thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[79a.4\]]nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi bsam pa'am/_zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do/_/de ltar sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[79a.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod cing /_
[\[79a.6\]]mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rnam par 'phel lo/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[79a.7\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir chags pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_ltung ba bya ba med par nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam 
[\[79b.2\]]sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_mi 'khrug 
[\[79b.3\]]pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[79b.4\]]gnas shing /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus mi gzhig pa nye bar bzung bas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems 
[\[79b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'khrug pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[79b.6\]]kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_
[\[79b.7\]]shes rab 'chal pa'i sems mi dmigs pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_pha rol 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]du phyin pa drug la gnas shing /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa nye bar bzung ba dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam yongs su 
[\[80a.2\]]sbyong ba yin no/_/de la sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/_/tshul khrims ni tshul khrims ngan pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/_/bzod pa ni 'khrug pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/_/brtson 'grus ni le lo nye bar bzung 
[\[80a.3\]]ba las gdags so/_/ting nge 'dzin ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/_/shes rab ni shes rab 'chal ba nye bar bzung ba las gdags so/_/de ni rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/ma rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/
[\[80a.4\]]sbyin pa byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/sbyin pa mi byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/tshul khrims dang ldan no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/tshul khrims ngan pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/bzod pa phun sum tshogs so 
[\[80a.5\]]zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/khro ba can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/le lo can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/mnyam par bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/
[\[80a.6\]]mnyam par ma bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/shes rab dang ldan no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/shes rab 'chal ba can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom 
[\[80a.7\]]sems med do/_/rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/rim gro ma byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma skyes pa ni spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/rim gro ma byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni rlom sems thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir te/_'di la sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems 
[\[80b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med de/_de yon tan 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin 
[\[80b.3\]]par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can 
[\[80b.4\]]thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems bskyed de/_sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob bo/_/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob nas/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sems can thams cad rab tu 
[\[80b.5\]]'god do/_/de ni tshe 'di nyid la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs su byon cing dben par bya ba yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_nyan thos thams cad dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yid du 'ong zhing dben par bya ba 
[\[80b.6\]]yin te/_de ni skye ba gang dang gang du skyes kyang /_de dang de dag tu nam yang mig gis yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs mi mthong ngo /_/rna bas yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi thos so/_/snas yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri mi tshor ro/_/lces yid du mi 'ong ba'i ro mi myong ngo /_/lus kyis yid du mi 'ong 
[\[80b.7\]]ba'i reg bya mi reg go/_/yid kyis yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnam par rig pa med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_dge slong sum brgyas gos gyon gyon pa/_bcom ldan 'das la yon du gsol te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/
[\[81a.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/_dge slong rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan de las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom 
[\[81a.3\]]ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad 
[\[81a.4\]]na/_ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo dge slong sum brgya po 'di dag ni bskal pa drug cu rtsa gcig 'das nas/_
[\[81a.5\]]bskal pa dpe skar ma lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal chen po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[81a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi sgul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye'o/_/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag drug cus kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[81a.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid du rab tu byung nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa des kyang /_de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_de'i tshe 'khor bzhi po de dag 'di na 'khod bzhin du/_shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong mthong bar gyur to/_/lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi 
[\[81b.2\]]phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong mthong bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba gang ji lta bur mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba de dag 
[\[81b.3\]]kyang /_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na yod par ma mthong ngo /_/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags stong phrag bcus bdag cag gis las gang byas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las spyad par bya'o zhes smon lam 
[\[81b.4\]]btab po/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs 
[\[81b.5\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/_ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis zhal 
[\[81b.6\]]'dzum pa mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo srog chags stong phrag 
[\[81b.7\]]bcu po 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang yang nam du yang mi 'bral te/_phyi ma'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal chen po'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan 
[\[82a.2\]]pa shes pa'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang /_dge slong gzhan dag kyang kun gyis mngon par shes pa shin tu mang ba dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu mang ba dag dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen 
[\[82a.3\]]dang /_dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[82a.4\]]'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa yangs pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dam pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rab po/_/pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni phul lo/_/pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[82a.5\]]'di ni mchog go/_/pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gya nom pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bzang po'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bla na ma mchis pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ltag na ma mchis pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa ma mchis pa'o/_/pha rol du 
[\[82a.6\]]phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dra ba ma mchis pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'o/_/pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' 'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[82a.7\]]rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[82b.2\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 
[\[82b.3\]]pha rol du phyin pa thub pa ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa yongs su btang ngo /_/yongs su gtong 
[\[82b.4\]]ngo /_/yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/yongs su rdzogs so/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 
[\[82b.5\]]lus thob par gyur to/_/thob po/_/'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/_/thob po/_'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das shes 
[\[82b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims bsrungs so/_/srung ngo /_/srung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[82b.7\]]rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/yongs su rdzogs so/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/_/thob po/_'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]chos 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/_/thob po/_'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[83a.2\]]chen po rnams kyis ni/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa bsgoms so/_/sgom mo/_/sgom par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/yongs su rdzogs so/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur 
[\[83a.3\]]ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/_/thob po/_/'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/_/thob po/_/'thob par 
[\[83a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams so/_/rtsom mo/_/rtsom par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang 
[\[83a.5\]]mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/yongs su rdzogs so/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/_/thob po/_'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa 
[\[83a.6\]]dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/_/thob po/_'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni mi 
[\[83a.7\]]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan bskyed do/_/skyed do/_/skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/yongs su rdzogs so/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/_/thob po/_/'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/_/thob po/_'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 
[\[83b.2\]]'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgoms so/_/sgom mo/_/sgom par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam 
[\[83b.3\]]pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/yongs su rdzogs so/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to/_/thob po/_'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i slad du mi mnyam pa dang 
[\[83b.4\]]mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/_/thob po/_'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs 
[\[83b.5\]]brnyes par gyur to/_/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa brnyes par gyur to/_/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par byang chub nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 
[\[83b.6\]]'khor lo bskor bar gyur to/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/_
[\[83b.7\]]mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs brnyes par gyur to/_/brnyes so/_/brnyes par 'gyur ro/_/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa brnyes par gyur to/_/brnyes so/_/brnyes par 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to/_/skor ro/_/skor bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta lags pas/_bcom ldan 'das byang 
[\[84a.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin par 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de 
[\[84a.3\]]dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba lags so/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad la 'di skad 
[\[84a.4\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad du smras pa bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 
[\[84a.5\]]phyag bya bar 'os pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/_mi'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i 'jig rten 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang /_bram 
[\[84a.6\]]ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang /_khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_
[\[84a.7\]]tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs 
[\[84b.2\]]rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag byang chub 
[\[84b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_khyim dang 'tsho ba dang nor bu dang mu tig dang dung dang man shel dang /_byi ru dang gser dang /_dngul dag kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[84b.4\]]rigs kyi bu dag sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad mi'i rkyen dang /_lha rdzas su bya ba 'am yang dag par bral ba'i bde ba'ang rung ste/_de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[84b.5\]]na/_rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas te/_bdag sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing gzhan yang sbyin pa la sbyor ro/_/bdag tshul khrims srung zhing gzhan yang tshul khrims la 
[\[84b.6\]]sbyor ro/_bdag bzod pa sgom zhing gzhan yang bzod pa la sbyor ro/_/bdag brtson 'grus rtsom zhing gzhan yang brtson 'grus la sbyor ro/_/bdag bsam gtan skyed cing gzhan yang bsam gtan la sbyor ro/_/bdag shes rab sgom zhing gzhan yang shes 
[\[84b.7\]]rab sgom pa la sbyor ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rten cing sems can rnams pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod de/_de dag pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pas/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]po/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du zhugs pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram 
[\[85a.2\]]ste stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par mdzad do/_/de nas de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od 'phro ba kha dog du ma dang kha dog sna tshogs su ldan pa mang po byung bar gyur to/_/de byung nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i 
[\[85a.3\]]klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/_/lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /_'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/_/
[\[85a.4\]]de nas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis 'od rnam par phye ba de mthong nas/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[85a.5\]]'das la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag snang ba chen pos bltam pa 'di su'i mthu lags zhes yongs su dris so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di nas nub phyogs 
[\[85a.6\]]logs na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_des zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[85a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]pa bstan pa'i phyir/_phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i bar du 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po 'di dag snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[85b.2\]]dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na bdag cag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang de la phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur ba dang /_
[\[85b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag kyang blta ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de yang mnyan pa'i slad du mchi'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la 
[\[85b.4\]]bab par shes na deng shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_lan bdun du g.yas phyogs nas 
[\[85b.5\]]bskor ba byas te/_phyogs bcu nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i ba dan dang /_me tog dang phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa dang bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang na bza' dang gser gyi me tog dang dngul gyi me tog la sogs pa rnam pa du ma khyer te/_glu dang 
[\[85b.6\]]rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba mang pos/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de gang na ba der 'dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_
[\[85b.7\]]mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad med snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad med dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad med che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_gnas gtsang ma pa shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_'og min gyi lha 
[\[86a.2\]]rnams kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang /_pad mo dang /_ku mud dang /_bun da ri ka dang /_lha rdzas kyi me tog man dA ra ba dang man dA ra ba chen po dang /_ke sa ra dang ta ma la'i 
[\[86a.3\]]lo ma mang po khyer te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_lha de dag gis me tog dang phreng ba dang spos 
[\[86a.4\]]dang byug pa dang bdug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i ba dan de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gtor to/_/mngon par gtor to/_/
[\[86a.5\]]de nas me tog la sogs pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/_me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa/_gru bzhi ka ba bzhi dang ldan pa/_cha kun du mnyam pa/_shin tu rnam par phye ba/_mdangs 
[\[86a.6\]]dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar red de 'dug go_/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob po/_/de nas de dag stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar bas btud de/_
[\[86a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang brnyes par gyur pa'i chos kyi rnam pa de lta bu thams cad thob 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]par gyur te/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'di lta bu yongs su bsdu bar bgyi'o/_/da ltar 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas chos ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du/_'khor 'di dang 'dra bar ni chos bstan par bgyi'o/_/zhes smon lam btab po/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[86b.2\]]'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud de/_chos thams cad la skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa la bzod par gyur pa mkhyen nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de 
[\[86b.3\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar bas btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[86b.4\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzad na/_ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'khor 'di'i nang nas srog 
[\[86b.5\]]chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na bskal pa me tog gi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[86b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi yan lag me tog ces bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_shA ri'i bu'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[86b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rtsom ste/_ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs pa skyed cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_tshe 
[\[87a.2\]]dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di rang gi shes rab dang spobs pa tsam gyi stobs dang shugs kyi go cas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston tam/_'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston par 'gyur snyam pa dang /_
[\[87a.3\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[87a.4\]]bu la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni gang ci smra yang rung /_gang ci ston kyang rung /_gang ci rjod kyang rung ste/_de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bstan pa de thams cad 
[\[87a.5\]]kyang chos nyid dang mi 'gal lo/_/de ltar rigs kyi bu de dag ni chos bstan pa de la slob cing /_chos nyid de lta bu mngon du byed do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/_shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[87a.6\]]phyin pa thabs kyis ston pa mdzad kyi/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa ni/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[87a.7\]]gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di chos gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bgyi ba de lta bu bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang /_
[\[87b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ming de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni su zhig_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gang zhig la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[87b.3\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming du bya ba de dag ni ming tsam ste/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_
[\[87b.4\]]gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_sems can sems can zhes bya bar ming du gdags pa'i ming de ni btags pa tsam ste/_btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni/_ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye 
[\[87b.5\]]pa 'am 'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/bdag dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag dang /_byed pa po dang /_byed du 'jug pa po dang /_
[\[87b.6\]]slong ba po dang /_yongs su slong ba po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_tshor bar byed pa po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po de dag thams cad kyang btags pa tsam ste/_btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 
[\[87b.7\]]'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming gang yin pa de dag 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]thams cad kyang btags pa tsam ste/_btags pa'i chos gang yin pa de la ni/_ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par 
[\[88a.2\]]yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na nang gi gzugs zhes ming du bya ba ni chos su btags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na 
[\[88a.3\]]yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes ming du bya ba ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad 
[\[88a.4\]]kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming dang chos de 
[\[88a.5\]]dag thams cad ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par/_skye ba 'am 'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/
[\[88a.6\]]rab 'byor mig ces bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la ni 'di lta ste mig ces ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba 'am 'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis 
[\[88a.7\]]ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ces bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la ni 'di lta ste/_yid ces ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skyes pa 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]'am 'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la ni 'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes ming dang brda tsam du tha 
[\[88b.2\]]snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa 
[\[88b.3\]]tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la ni 'di lta ste/_chos zhes ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par/_skye ba'am 'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 
[\[88b.4\]]mig gi khams zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la ni/_'di lta ste/_mig gi khams zhes ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par/_skye ba'am 'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi 
[\[88b.5\]]rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzugs kyi khams zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la ni 'di lta ste/_gzugs kyi khams zhes ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa 
[\[88b.6\]]ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags 
[\[88b.7\]]pa de la ni 'di lta ste/_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am/_'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]rab 'byor rna ba'i khams dang /_sgra'i khams dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna'i khams dang /_dri'i khams dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lce'i khams dang /_ro'i khams dang /_lce'i 
[\[89a.2\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus kyi khams dang /_reg bya'i khams dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid kyi khams dang /_chos kyi khams dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni chos su gdags pa tsam du 
[\[89a.3\]]zad de/_chos su btags pa de la ni 'di lta ste/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med 
[\[89a.4\]]par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya ba dag kyang chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags 
[\[89a.5\]]pa de la ni 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming zhes bya bar ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par/_skye ba 'am 'gag pa med de/_ming 
[\[89a.6\]]de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nang gi lus zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du/_tha snyad kyis gdags pa ste/_mgo'i rus pa zhes ming du tha snyad kyis gdags pa 
[\[89a.7\]]dang /_mjing pa'i rus pa zhes ming du tha snyad kyis gdags pa dang /_phrag pa'i rus pa dang /_dpung pa'i rus pa dang /_tshigs pa'i rus pa dang /_rtsib ma'i rus pa dang /_dpyi'i rus pa dang /_brla'i rus pa dang /_rje ngar gyi rus pa dang /_rkang pa'i rus pa 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]zhes ming du tha snyad kyis gdags pa de dag kyang /_chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la ni 'di lta ste/_mgo'i rus pa zhes bya ba dang /_rkang pa'i rus pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs 
[\[89b.2\]]par skye ba 'am 'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[89b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ming du bya ba dag kyang chos su gdags pa tsam du zad de/_chos su btags pa de la ni ming dang brda tsam du tha snyad kyis gdags pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am 'gag pa med de/_ming de ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang
