[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam 
[\[139a.2\]]par shes pa smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs dben pa nyid/_gzugs dben pa nyid kyis stong 
[\[139a.3\]]ste/_gzugs dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang /_gzugs dben pa nyid ma lags/_gzugs dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_gzugs dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid kyang gzugs 
[\[139a.4\]]dben pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[139a.5\]]'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid/_rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/_rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid 
[\[139a.6\]]kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang /_rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid ma lags/_rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid las gud na yang /_stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid 
[\[139a.7\]]do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/_de bzhin nyid kyi 
[\[139b.2\]]stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang de bzhin nyid ma lags/_de bzhin nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[139b.3\]]sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/_chos 
[\[139b.4\]]nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos nyid ma lags/_chos nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid kyang chos nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[139b.5\]]sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings/_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[139b.6\]]kyis stong ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/_chos kyi dbyings las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_chos kyi dbyings kyang stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so/_/bcom 
[\[139b.7\]]ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos skyon med pa nyid chos skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste/_chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang /_chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags/_chos skyon med pa nyid las 
[\[140a.2\]]gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_chos skyon med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid kyang chos skyon med pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[140a.3\]]du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong 
[\[140a.4\]]ste/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags/_yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid kyang stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[140a.5\]]yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[140a.6\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_bdag tu bgyi ba dang /_bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/_de gzugs 
[\[140a.7\]]mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas na/_de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[140b.2\]]rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub 
[\[140b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_bdag tu bgyi ba dang /_bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la gnas na/_de yang dag 
[\[140b.4\]]pa'i mtha'i mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[140b.5\]]yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 
[\[140b.6\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste/_gzugs kyi yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du gzugs ma lags/_
[\[140b.7\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste/_rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du/_rnam par shes pa ma lags/_
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa ste/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags te/_shes rab kyi 
[\[141a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong ba'i slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 
[\[141a.3\]]stong pa nyid du yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/_ci nas kyang chos gang la yang yid rnam par mi rgyu ba de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[141a.4\]]chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ba ste/_rgya che ba/_phul du bgyi ba/_tshad ma mchis pa/_tshad ma mchis par nges pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing /_de dag dang thun mong ma lags pa 
[\[141a.5\]]ste/_ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[141a.6\]]phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med 
[\[141a.7\]]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du/_yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni mtshan mas brjod pa ma lags pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar mtshan ma las nyon mongs pa 'byung ste/_mtshan ma de dag gang zhe 
[\[141b.2\]]na/_gzugs ni mtshan ma'o/_/tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o/_/'du shes ni mtshan ma'o/_/'du byed ni mtshan ma'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o/_/mig ni mtshan ma'o/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni mtshan ma'o/_/gzugs 
[\[141b.3\]]ni mtshan ma'o/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos ni mtshan ma'o/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid 
[\[141b.4\]]kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg padang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o/_/mig gi 
[\[141b.5\]]'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 
[\[141b.6\]]tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o/_/sa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o/_/chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o/_/ma rig pa 
[\[141b.7\]]ni mtshan ma'o/_/'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi ni mtshan ma'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o/_/
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o/_/nang stong pa nyid 
[\[142a.2\]]ni mtshan ma'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mtshan ma'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 
[\[142a.3\]]rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs 
[\[142a.4\]]med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 
[\[142a.5\]]'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni mtshan ma'o/_/yi ge rnams ni 
[\[142a.6\]]mtshan ma'o/_/gcig tu brjod pa ni mtshan ma'o/_/gnyis su brjod pa ni mtshan ma'o/_/tha dad du brjod pa ni mtshan ma ste/_de ni nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'o/_/gal te de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de mtshan mar bzung ba zhig lags na ni/_
[\[142a.7\]]kun du rgyu ba phreng ba can yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la dad pa thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/dad pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yid ches pa dang /_rtog pa dang /_mos pa dang /_rten pa dang /_sems pa dang /_'jal 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]ba dang dpyod pa ste/_de yang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags/_mtshan ma mchis pa'i tshul du yang ma lags so/_/de ltar na de ni mtshan ma dang mtshan ma mchis pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pas yongs su bzung ba lags te/_kun 
[\[142b.2\]]tu rgyu ba phreng ba can des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos par gyur nas/_dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas nyi tshe ba'i ye shes kyis zhugs te/_de ltar zhugs nas gzugs yongs su ma bzung /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[142b.3\]]byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ngo /_/de ni 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa ma dmigs te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar des ye shes de rtogs pa dang /_thob par bgyi ba'i 
[\[142b.4\]]tshul gyis nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_ye shes de rtogs pa dang /_thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_ye shes de rtogs pa dang /_thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis phyi nang du yang dag par rjes 
[\[142b.5\]]su ma mthong /_ye shes de rtogs pa dang /_thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis de las gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar des chos gang gis rtogs par bgyi ba dang /_gang rtogs par bgyid pa 
[\[142b.6\]]dang /_gang rtogs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/_des ye shes de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_ye shes de tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i nang du 
[\[142b.7\]]yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_ye shes de gzugs kyi phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_ye shes de tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_ye shes 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]de gzugs kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_ye shes de tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_ye shes de gzugs ma lags pa gzhan 
[\[143a.2\]]du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_ye shes de tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi nang du yang yang dag par rjes su 
[\[143a.3\]]ma mthong /_ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /_ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par 
[\[143a.4\]]rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can mos par gyur te/_de ltar mos par gyur na/_dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te/_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[143a.5\]]nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te/_de de ltar mos par gyur nas/_des chos gang yang mtshan ma mchis pa dang /_yid la bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis te/_chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis/_
[\[143a.6\]]gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du/_yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba'am/_gtang bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang des ma dmigs te/_chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du/_de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom 
[\[143a.7\]]sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /_chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi

[\[143b.6\]]bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags 
[\[143b.7\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad dang /_mthar 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_

[\[144a.7\]]ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma lags te/_de dag ni chos kyang ma lags/_chos ma lags pa yang ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/_

[\[144b.1\]]gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /_chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung ba'i slad du/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 
[\[144b.2\]]'dzin pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[144b.3\]]rnam pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gang gi/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig_/ci'i phyir na de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi

[\[144b.5\]]zhes gal te/_de ltar yang dag par rjes su mthong na/_de yang dag par rjes su mthong ba zhes bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma mchis/_mi dmigs so/_/gal te 'di ltar 
[\[144b.6\]]chos gang yod pa ma yin zhing mi dmigs pa de/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yin nam zhes spyod na/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad 
[\[144b.7\]]ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang rnams med cing mi dmigs pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor 
[\[145a.2\]]ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 
[\[145a.3\]]nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin

[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa 
[\[145b.2\]]nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_skye mched rnams dang /_khams rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i

[\[145b.6\]]dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_
[\[145b.7\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/_de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so/_/chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' med cing mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/_rgyun du zhugs pa yang med cing mi dmigs so/_/
[\[146a.2\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_nang stong pa nyid

[\[146a.5\]]rtog cing sems pa'i tshe/_sems zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med la/_mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o/_/smras 
[\[146a.6\]]pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs ni 
[\[146a.7\]]gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]dang bral ba/_'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/_'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

[\[146b.3\]]ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[146b.4\]]dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/_nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[146b.5\]]stong pa nyid kyi bar du/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams 
[\[146b.6\]]dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden ba rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar 
[\[146b.7\]]ba brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/_rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_
[\[147a.2\]]phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang byang chub dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/_de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[147a.3\]]chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid dang /_chos skyon med pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha' rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_yang dag pa ji 
[\[147a.4\]]lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang 
[\[147a.5\]]rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/
[\[147a.6\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[147a.7\]]rnam grangs des na/_'di ltar gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang /_skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi/_rang bzhin med pa dang /_khams rnams la khams kyi rang 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]bzhin med pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do/_/tshor 
[\[147b.2\]]ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do/_/skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi mtshan nyid med do/_/khams rnams la khams kyi mtshan nyid med do/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid 
[\[147b.3\]]med do/_/yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid med do/_/mtshan nyid la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do/_/mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 
[\[147b.4\]]bslab pa 'di la slob pa de/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 
[\[147b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gzugs kyis 
[\[147b.6\]]stong ste/_de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/_'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/_de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/_'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/_
[\[147b.7\]]de la skye ba yang mi dmigs/_'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/_de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]gyur pa de lta de ltar/_lus yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_sems yongs su dag pa dang /_mtshan yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_sems yongs su dag 
[\[148a.2\]]pa dang /_mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do/_/zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang /_gti mug dang ldan pa dang /_nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang /_g.yo dang sgyu dang ldan pa dang /_phrag dog dang 
[\[148a.3\]]ser sna dang ldan pa dang /_sred pa dang ldan pa dang /_lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do/_/de 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed cing /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nga rgyal dang /_g.yo dang /_sgyu dang /_phrag dog dang ser sna dang /_sred pa dang /_lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi 
[\[148a.4\]]skyed pas/_nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/_khor zug rtag par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed 
[\[148a.5\]]cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang 
[\[148a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang legs pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid la brtson 'grus mi btang bar spyad par byas te/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[148a.7\]]la de ltar spyod pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u lnga pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi mkhas pas/_gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du gal te 
[\[148b.2\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/gal te gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/_
[\[148b.3\]]mtshan ma la spyod do/_/gal te gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/gal te tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/gal te gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na 
[\[148b.4\]]mtshan ma la spyod do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/gal te gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam 
[\[148b.5\]]par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/gal te gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/gal te gzugs 
[\[148b.6\]]bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/gal te gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[148b.7\]]byed dang /_rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/gal te gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/gal te 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/gal te gzugs mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma 
[\[149a.2\]]la spyod do/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mi 
[\[149a.3\]]mkhas pas/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams 
[\[149a.4\]]dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon bar 
[\[149a.5\]]shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_
[\[149a.6\]]bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_ma zhi ba dang /_dben ba dang /_mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems 
[\[149a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do zhes bgyi bar spyod na dmigs pa la spyod pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma la spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom mo zhes bgyi bar spyod na yang mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs 
[\[149b.2\]]mi mkhas par rig par bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bya ba yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[149b.3\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba 
[\[149b.4\]]dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam 
[\[149b.5\]]par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/_rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang /_
[\[149b.6\]]yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/_rna ba 
[\[149b.7\]]dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/_gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/_mig gi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]byin gyis rlob/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes 
[\[150a.2\]]te byin gyis rlob/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te 
[\[150a.3\]]byin gyis rlob/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes 
[\[150a.4\]]te byin gyis rlob/_ma rig pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang len pa dang /_srid pa dang skye ba dang /_rga shi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis 
[\[150a.5\]]rlob/_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar ba 
[\[150a.6\]]brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_mig lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 
[\[150a.7\]]dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/_de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlobs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/_de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/_sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar 
[\[150b.2\]]brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyis yang mngon du bya ba'i skal pa med na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/_/
[\[150b.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/_thabs mi mkhas par shes par bya'o/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ji ltar 
[\[150b.4\]]spyod na thabs mkhas par shes par bya/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_gzugs la mi spyod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la 
[\[150b.5\]]yang mi spyod/_gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/_gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/_gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs sdug bsngal 
[\[150b.6\]]zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang /_gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang /_gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs mi stong zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_gzugs 
[\[150b.7\]]mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang /_gzugs mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]mi spyod/_mi rtag ces bya ba dang /_bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /_bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag med ces bya ba dang /_zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /_stong zhes bya ba dang /_mi stong zhes bya ba dang /_mtshan ma yod 
[\[151a.2\]]ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /_smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya ba dang /_dben zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[151a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med/_gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/_stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/_gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[151a.4\]]shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes pa med/_rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/_stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa nyid 
[\[151a.5\]]kyang stong pa nyid do/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_
[\[151a.6\]]tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar ba rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 
[\[151a.7\]]'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]yin pa de yang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/_stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/_stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid do/_/
[\[151b.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po bcu gcig pa/_tshe dang 
[\[151b.3\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod do/_/de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod kyang spyod do zhes bya 
[\[151b.4\]]bar mi dmigs so/_/mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/_/spyod pa 'ang ma yin mi spyod pa 'ang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_byang chub sems 
[\[151b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/_spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/_spyod pa yang ma yin/_mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar 
[\[151b.6\]]yang mi dmigs pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/_tshe dang ldan pa sha 
[\[151b.7\]]ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/_/mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/_/spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]dmigs so/_/spyod pa 'ang ma yin/_mi spyod pa 'ang ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[152a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na/_gal te sems ma zhum/_kun tu ma zhum/_mi skrag_/kun tu mi skrag_/kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[152a.3\]]nyid dang nye bar gyur par rig par bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_gnyis su med gnyis su byar med do/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes 
[\[152a.4\]]bya ba ste/_rgya che ba mchog tu bya ba tshad med par nges pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa ste/_ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[152a.5\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di 'ba' zhig gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'am/_'on te de lta bu'i ting nge 
[\[152a.6\]]'dzin gzhan dag kyang yod/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag la rnam par spyod pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[152a.7\]]'gyur ba yod do/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/_ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[152b.2\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod 
[\[152b.3\]]do/_/chos thams cad las shin du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod 
[\[152b.4\]]do/_/nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/
[\[152b.5\]]'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/tshig 
[\[152b.6\]{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/nyam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos thams cad yang dag 
[\[152b.7\]]par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/dbang po'i dpal 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[153a.2\]]yod do/_/rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[153a.3\]]'dzin yod do/_/'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/
[\[153a.4\]]dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/zad pa dang 
[\[153a.5\]]bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/shes rab sgron ma 
[\[153a.6\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[153a.7\]]yod do/_/sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos kyi 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa 
[\[153b.2\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rnam pa 
[\[153b.3\]]med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/
[\[153b.4\]]g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing 
[\[153b.5\]]gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes 
[\[153b.6\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rnam pa 
[\[153b.7\]]mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rnam pa gcig tu 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rnam par 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/srid pa'i gzhi thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/brda dang sgra 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/mngon par dmigs 
[\[154a.2\]]pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[154a.3\]]yod do/_/gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/'thun pa 
[\[154a.4\]]dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[154a.5\]]yod do/_/rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/
[\[154a.6\]]nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod 
[\[154a.7\]]do/_/de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel bas rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/_/
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/_ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 
[\[154b.2\]]par 'tshang rgya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/_ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[154b.3\]]pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de ltar ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo gang la bslabs pas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur 
[\[154b.4\]]ba de lta bu tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod de/_de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa de ni sngon 
[\[154b.5\]]gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[154b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni 
[\[154b.7\]]ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med do/_/bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go_/bdag gis mnyam par gzhag par bya'o/_/bdag ni mnyam par gzhag par 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]gyur to zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de/_de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi rgyu'o/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[155a.2\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa yod dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan la/_ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan 
[\[155a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to/_/ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te de ltar ting 
[\[155a.4\]]nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'/_byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin 
[\[155a.5\]]yin na/_de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes su 
[\[155a.6\]]byed pa med do/_/smras pa/_ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtog pa med de/_de ltar na rigs kyi bu de ting nge 
[\[155a.7\]]'dzin de la rtog pa med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do/_/'du shes su byed pa med do/_/smras pa/_ci'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med cing /_'du shes su 'gyur ba med/_rab 'byor 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]gyis smras pa/_ting nge 'dzin de yang med la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang med pa'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med do/_/'du shes su 'gyur ba med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste rab 'byor legs 
[\[155b.2\]]so legs so/_/tshig 'di ni legs par bshad do/_/ji ltar ngas nyon mongs pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na mchog tu bshad pa des bshad pa ni 'di yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[155b.3\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[155b.4\]{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la bslab par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po/_/
[\[155b.5\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[155b.6\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/_bsam 
[\[155b.7\]]gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi 
[\[156a.2\]]dmigs so/_/sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_phung po dang /_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_
[\[156a.3\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/_/shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so/_/shin 
[\[156a.4\]]du rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so/_/shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so/_/shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol du phyin pa rnams mi dmigs so/_/shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 
[\[156a.5\]]rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar ba rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[156a.6\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_
[\[156a.7\]]snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so/_/shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so/_/shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/_/
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so/_/shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub mi dmigs so/_/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[156b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang /_mi 'gag pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang 
[\[156b.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[156b.4\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang slob pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par yod pa ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_
[\[156b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das 'o na chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/_de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/_de'i phyir med ces bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa de la 
[\[156b.6\]]mchis pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa na nga stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po 
[\[156b.7\]]med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/_/de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas/_srid pa la mngon par zhen te/_de dag gis med pa yongs su brtags pas/_med pa la mngon par zhen cing 'di lta ste/_
[\[157a.2\]]chad pa dang /_rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas/_de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/_gang med pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags nas/_ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen cing /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[157a.3\]]chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mngon par zhen to/_/de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/_de dag mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/_gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[157a.4\]]dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi 
[\[157a.5\]]shes mi mthong ngo /_/de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dong ba ste/_de dag 'byung ba ma yin no/_/gang nas 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/_'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/_/gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/_/gzugs med pa'i 
[\[157a.6\]]khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no/_/de dag ni yid mi ches pa ste/_ji ltar yid mi ches zhe na/_gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/_/byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyis 
[\[157a.7\]]stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/_/de dag ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/_ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la gnas pa ma yin no/_/de dag ni mngon par zhen pa ma yin 
[\[157b.2\]]te/_ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/_gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/_mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_
[\[157b.3\]]yid la mngon par zhen pa yin/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/_lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/_byang chub kyi 
[\[157b.4\]]bar la mngon par zhen pa yin te/_de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/_
[\[157b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i 
[\[157b.6\]]slad du byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs 
[\[157b.7\]]mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]du phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[158a.2\]]rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad dang /_mthar 
[\[158a.3\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi 
[\[158a.4\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[158a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnam 
[\[158a.6\]]pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/_ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[158a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de mi dmigs/_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]no/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_
[\[158b.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs/_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[158b.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob pa ni/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/
[\[158b.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam 
[\[158b.5\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u drug pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di 
[\[158b.6\]]skad du 'dri zhing /_ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/_bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/_
[\[158b.7\]]ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]ram/_ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing /_rnam pa 
[\[159a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/_bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de lta bas na/_de khyod nyid la 
[\[159a.3\]]dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig_/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 
[\[159a.4\]]'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_mig kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma 
[\[159a.5\]]yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_gzugs kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan 
[\[159a.6\]]zhig yin snyam 'am/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan 
[\[159a.7\]]la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor 
[\[159b.2\]]ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub kyi 
[\[159b.3\]]phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]
[\[159b.4\]]brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_byang chub kyang gzhan la/_sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin 
[\[159b.5\]]snyam 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[159b.6\]]byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/_
[\[159b.7\]]sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go/_/bcom ldan 'das rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_yid nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do/_/bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]gzhan ma lags te/_gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos kyang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so/_/
[\[160a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_
[\[160a.3\]]lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mig gi 
[\[160a.4\]]'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_
[\[160a.5\]]lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang 
[\[160a.6\]]gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor 
[\[160a.7\]]ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang 
[\[160b.2\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[160b.3\]]pa rnams so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/_sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/_byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/_sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma la skye ba'am/_
[\[160b.4\]]'gag pa yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so 
[\[160b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[160b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/_de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bzod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i 
[\[160b.7\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar du bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la/_
[\[161a.2\]]'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang /_brda dang /_gdags pa dang /_tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_'du 
[\[161a.3\]]shes dang /_brda dang /_gdags pa dang /_tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la skye ba'am/_'gag pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/_
[\[161a.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/_gang la 'du shes med cing brda med pa dang /_gdags pa med pa dang /_tha snyad med pa dang /_ming med pa dang /_ming du gdags pa med
