[\[183b.1\]]'byung ba med pa dang /_mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_gzugs shin 
[\[183b.2\]]du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[183b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[183b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar du shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub 
[\[183b.5\]]kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas 
[\[183b.6\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin du 
[\[183b.7\]]rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_bdag med pa'i phyir bdag shin du 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong 
[\[184a.2\]]ba po med pa'i phyir/_sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba po shin du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/_/rab 
[\[184a.3\]]'byor de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i tshe/_mun pa'i gnas med do/_/rab 
[\[184a.4\]]'byor de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i tshe/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med do/_/
[\[184a.5\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[184a.6\]]rgyas kyi tshul khrims la/_tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de 
[\[184a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'khrug pa'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la/_shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha 
[\[184b.2\]]rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la/_rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang 
[\[184b.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes 
[\[184b.4\]]gzigs pa la/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[184b.5\]]nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_gza' dang /_skar ma dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_
[\[184b.6\]]glog gi 'od la gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med 
[\[184b.7\]]do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 
[\[185a.2\]]'od la gnas med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don 
[\[185a.3\]]med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_
[\[185a.4\]]thogs pa med pa/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la ma chags pa dang /_med pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[185a.5\]]dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la rtog pa med cing /_rnam par rtog pa med par yang rig par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang rnams kyi ma chags pa dang 
[\[185a.6\]]mchis pa ma lags pa yang dag pa nyid la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni gang rnams rig par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du bstan pa dang /_
[\[185a.7\]]lung du ma bstan pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_thun mong dang /_thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/_
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos de dag thams cad la ma chags pa dang /_med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes par bya ba yang chos thams cad po 
[\[185b.2\]]de dag nyid do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni/_phar shes pa/_mar shes pa/_dge sbyong du shes pa/_bram zer shes pa/_
[\[185b.3\]]rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang /_sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang /_nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang /_dge ba bcu'i las 
[\[185b.4\]]kyi lam rnams dang /_'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/_'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /_'bu can gyi 'du shes dang /_rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par 
[\[185b.5\]]'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /_rus pa'i 'du shes dang /_rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang /_'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/_'di ltar sangs 
[\[185b.6\]]rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang /_skyo ba rjes 
[\[185b.7\]]su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/_de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/_'di ltar rab 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/_/ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_zhe gcod pa dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_chags sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_
[\[186a.2\]]log par lta ba dang /_khro ba dang /_mdud par 'dzin pa dang /_'chab pa dang /_'tshig pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_nga rgyal dang /_log pa'i nga rgyal ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[186a.3\]]ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lus kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/ngag gi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/yid kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/
[\[186a.4\]]dbang po lnga ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/skye mched drug ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/gzugs med pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched ni lung ma bstan pa'o/_/rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung ma bstan pa ste/_rab 'byor de 
[\[186a.5\]]dag ni lung ma bstan pa'i chos su shes par bya'o/_/gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/_phung po dang /_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_dge ba 
[\[186a.6\]]bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par/_de ma yin par 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag 
[\[186a.7\]]ni 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_ma shes pa 
[\[186b.2\]]yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang /_yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang /_yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang po dang /_rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med cing dpyod pa 
[\[186b.3\]]med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rig pa dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_dran pa dang /_shes bzhin dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad de/_brgyad gang zhe na/_gzugs dang ldan pa gzugs mthong ba 'di ni/_rnam par thar ba dang po'o/_/
[\[186b.4\]]nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/_phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar ba gnyis pa'o/_/sdug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/_/gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par 
[\[186b.5\]]gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_
[\[186b.6\]]rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_cung zad ma yod do zhes/_cung zad med pa'i skye 
[\[186b.7\]]mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/_/de rnam 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/_/rnam par thar ba brgyad po de dag dang /_mthar gyis gnas 
[\[187a.2\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/_dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de 'dod pas dben/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs 
[\[187a.3\]]te gnas so/_/de rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/_nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/_rnam par rtog pa med pa/_rnam par dpyod pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la 
[\[187a.4\]]nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/_dran pa dang ldan zhing /_shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la/_'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/_bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes 
[\[187a.5\]]brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs/_sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing /_yid bde ba dang /_yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/_bde ba yang med/_sdug bsngal ba yang med pa/_btang 
[\[187a.6\]]snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed 
[\[187a.7\]]pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_cung zad ma yod do zhes/_cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las 
[\[187b.2\]]yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de ltar mthar gyis 
[\[187b.3\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[187b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag ste/_de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[187b.5\]]'di lta ste/_phung po dang /_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/_de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das zag pa 
[\[187b.6\]]ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 
[\[187b.7\]]dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag ste/_de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos 
[\[188a.2\]]zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_gzhan yang de ma 
[\[188a.3\]]yin pa 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos rnams/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag ste/_de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[188a.4\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/_gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang /_gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/_'dod chags zad pa/_zhe sdang zad pa/_gti mug zad pa/_de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin 
[\[188a.5\]]nyid/_chos nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid/_chos skyon med pa nyid/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings/_yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[188a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/_de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang /_thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[188a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar dag ste/_de dag ni thun mong 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas/_chags par mi bya'o/_/chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa 
[\[188b.2\]]med cing /_rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de ci'i 
[\[188b.3\]]slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[188b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba/_de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor sems can gyi 
[\[188b.5\]]phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/_'di lta ste/_rigs kyis dang /_brgyad pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 
[\[188b.6\]]gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/_rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po nges pa zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo 
[\[188b.7\]]rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/_sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]'di ltar sems bskyed de/_'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o/_/bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can thams cad la 
[\[189a.2\]]sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/_/de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang /_sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan 
[\[189a.3\]]las 'das pa med pas/_chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o/_/bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod par bya'o/_/bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad 
[\[189a.4\]]kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o/_/bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o/_/bdag gis phung po nas brtsams te pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[189a.5\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar bsgrub pa khong du chud pa la bslab par bya'o/_/bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa 
[\[189a.6\]]thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o/_/snyam du sems bskyed de/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/_de de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges 
[\[189a.7\]]pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_sems can dmyal ba pa dang /_byol song gi skye gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang du 'di ltar sems bskyed par 
[\[189b.2\]]bya ste/_bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag 
[\[189b.3\]]kyang /_bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don tu/_sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug 
[\[189b.4\]]bsngal de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/_/de nas gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[189b.5\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/_de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi 
[\[189b.6\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems 
[\[189b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/_'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/_zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/_gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/_gtse ba'i sems mi bskyed/_nyan thos kyi sems dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]sems kyang mi bskyed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o/_/des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang /_sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su mi bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[190a.2\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing /_des rlom sems su mi 
[\[190a.3\]]byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/_/sems des sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can 
[\[190a.4\]]thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems ni/_sems can thams cad skyob cing /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/_des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med 
[\[190a.5\]]pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems te/_de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[190a.6\]]pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o/_/chos la dga' bar bya'o/_/chos la mos par bya'o/_/chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/_/de la chos gang zhe na/_chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/_'di ni chos zhes bya'o/_/de la chos 'dod pa 
[\[190a.7\]]gang zhe na/_gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/_'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o/_/de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/_chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/_'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/_gang chos de la yon 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]tan du lta ba ste/_'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o/_/de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/_chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/_'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[190b.2\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/_sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/_nang stong pa nyid la gnas/_phyi 
[\[190b.3\]]stong pa nyid la gnas/_phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/_sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[190b.4\]]la spyod pas/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i 
[\[190b.5\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig 
[\[190b.6\]]pa rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar la gnas te/_sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[190b.7\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/_nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/_sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]'gyur bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa de/_sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du byed pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[191a.2\]]dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[191a.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la spobs pa skyed cig_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba dang /_sems can du lta ba dang /_srog tu lta ba dang /_gang zag tu lta ba dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag 
[\[191a.4\]]dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_shes pa po dang /_mthong ba por lta ba dang /_chad par lta ba dang /_rtag par lta ba dang /_yod par lta ba dang /_med par lta ba dang /_phung por lta ba dang /_khams su lta ba dang /_skye mched du lta ba dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar 
[\[191a.5\]]lta ba dang /_pha rol du phyin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang /_byang chub tu lta ba dang /_sangs 
[\[191a.6\]]rgyas su lta ba dang /_chos su lta ba dang /_dge 'dun du lta ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa bgyid kyang /_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/_de'i slad 
[\[191a.7\]]du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]'gyur ba yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[191b.2\]]du phyin pa la spyod cing /_thabs mi mkhas pas/_gzugs la dmigs shing /_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes par dmigs shing /_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/skye mched dang /_
[\[191b.3\]]khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar dmigs shing /_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_
[\[191b.4\]]dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par 
[\[191b.5\]]dmigs shing /_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de 
[\[191b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing /_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du 
[\[191b.7\]]dmigs shing /_dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/_yongs 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas/_lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos 
[\[192a.2\]]ston to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[192a.3\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la yang chags 
[\[192a.4\]]pa ma mchis pas/_de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni/_zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/_de ltar thams cad 
[\[192a.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing /_khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/_de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' ni sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o/_/de 
[\[192a.6\]]ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar sems ni sems ma mchis pa ste/_sems ma mchis pa de la yang chags pa ma mchis so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[192a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_'gag pa dang /_'phel ba dang /_'grib pa dang /_'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[192b.2\]]ti'i bu gang la skye ba med cing /_'gag pa med pa dang /_'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang /_'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la/_nyan thos kyi sems med do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/_/
[\[192b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sems med do/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams 
[\[192b.4\]]cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/_khongs su chud pa med pa/_de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/_tshe dang 
[\[192b.5\]]ldan pa rab 'byor de bas gzugs kyang chags pa med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/_
[\[192b.6\]]gzugs kyang chags pa med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang chags pa med do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang chags pa 
[\[192b.7\]]med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa med 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]cing /_khongs su chud pa med de zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang mi zad de/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/nyan 
[\[193a.2\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_de yin te tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo 
[\[193a.3\]]rnams kyi sems kyang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 
[\[193a.4\]]thugs kyang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta yin na/_gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[193a.5\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 
[\[193a.6\]]yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/_gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes 
[\[193a.7\]]dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/_sems med pa'i phyir/_sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma 
[\[193b.2\]]zad de/_gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do/_/tshor ba med pa dang /_'du shes med pa dang /_'du byed med pa dang /_rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi 
[\[193b.3\]]chos rnams la chags pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags 
[\[193b.4\]]pa med do/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/_gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do/_/tshor ba med pa dang /_'du shes med pa dang /_'du byed med pa dang /_rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/_/
[\[193b.5\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[193b.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 
[\[193b.7\]]sems/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang /_chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/_/mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la/_bdag kyang spobs pa 
[\[194a.2\]]skye'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig_/gang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems 
[\[194a.3\]]can lags la/_de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/_de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[194a.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos shes bya/_gang pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol 
[\[194a.5\]]du phyin pa la gnas shing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /_/sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /_tshul 
[\[194a.6\]]khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_tshul khrims srung ngo /_/sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /_bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi/_sems can thams 
[\[194a.7\]]cad kyi don tu bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_bzod pa sgom mo/_/sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyi don tu/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]cing /_brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /_bsam gtan skyed pa ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyi don tu bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_bsam gtan skyed do/_/
[\[194b.2\]]sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing /_shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyi don tu/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_shes rab sgom mo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 
[\[194b.3\]]sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe'am/_sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o/_/sems can 'di 
[\[194b.4\]]snyed ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don tu go cha chen po gyon to/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su 
[\[194b.5\]]rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab 
[\[194b.6\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sbyor bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_
[\[194b.7\]]tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyar bar bya'o/_/bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so 
[\[195a.2\]]yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la gnas par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems skyed de/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/_byang 
[\[195a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po bcu bzhi pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab 
[\[195a.4\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang 
[\[195a.5\]]thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra 
[\[195a.6\]]dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[195a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_chos de dag 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]la bzod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[195b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa yongs su 
[\[195b.3\]]gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_sems rtse 
[\[195b.4\]]gcig tu byed cing /_de la dmigs pa gcig pas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/_
[\[195b.5\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_chos thams 
[\[195b.6\]]cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/_sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/_gtong ba yang mi dmigs/_len pa yang mi dmigs par/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 
[\[195b.7\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang /_sems can dang /_byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[196a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_
[\[196a.3\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub 
[\[196a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_
[\[196a.5\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa mi skyed na so so'i skye bo'i sa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[196a.6\]]rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_chos de dag la bzod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_rten pa 'di ni 
[\[196a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[196b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang 
[\[196b.3\]]thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan 
[\[196b.4\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes 
[\[196b.5\]]nye bar gnas shing /_tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_tshul khrims de yang mi dmigs shing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_
[\[196b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/_pha rol du 
[\[196b.7\]]phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/_de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang /_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo 
[\[197a.2\]]ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[197a.3\]]sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang /_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[197a.4\]]yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[197a.5\]]spyod cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_chos de dag la bzod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[197a.6\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_brtson 'grus nyams par 
[\[197a.7\]]mi byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_
[\[197b.2\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_
[\[197b.3\]]bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/_bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing bzod pa la mi dmigs pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_
[\[197b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang /_sems can dang /_byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing /_
[\[197b.5\]]mi dmigs pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 
[\[197b.6\]]spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[197b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims srung zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de 
[\[198a.2\]]yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang 
[\[198a.3\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_chos de dag la 
[\[198a.4\]]de ltar bzod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[198a.5\]]po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_sems can thams cad kyi don du/_brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing brtun mi 
[\[198a.6\]]ngas pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[198a.7\]]rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_chos thams cad la 
[\[198b.2\]]sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/_brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing /_brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su 
[\[198b.3\]]sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[198b.4\]]dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang /_sems can dang /_byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing /_mi dmigs pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/_/
[\[198b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_sbyin 
[\[198b.6\]]pa yongs su gtong zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_sbyin 
[\[198b.7\]]pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims srung zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[199a.2\]]po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang 
[\[199a.3\]]ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bzod pa yongs su sgom ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_
[\[199a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan 
[\[199a.5\]]pa'i yid bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed de de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang 
[\[199a.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[199a.7\]]dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba la/_sems rtse gcig tu byed de/_de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/
[\[199b.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/_bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing /_bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs 
[\[199b.3\]]te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go 
[\[199b.4\]]cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_pha rol du phyin pa de dag dang /_sems can dang /_byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing /_mi dmigs pa 'di ni/_byang chub 
[\[199b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[199b.6\]]rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[199b.7\]]pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_
[\[200a.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[200a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la gnas shing rten te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 
[\[200a.4\]]sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[200a.5\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de 
[\[200a.6\]]yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang 
[\[200a.7\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_sems rtse gcig 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]tu byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du 
[\[200b.2\]]phyin pa'i go cha'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 
[\[200b.3\]]yin gyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_
[\[200b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i go cha ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/_
[\[200b.5\]]pha rol du phyin pa 'di dag dang /_sems can dang /_byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing /_mi dmigs pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i/_pha rol du phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar 
[\[200b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_pha rol du phyin pa re re la gnas shing /_pha rol du phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[200b.7\]]gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang myong bar mi byed do/_/bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa de dag gis kyang mi 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]'phrogs te/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa/_
[\[201a.2\]]thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa 
[\[201a.3\]]dang /_smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/_de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/_yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed de/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[201a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems 
[\[201a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la/_shar phyogs dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_byang shar dang /_shar lho dang /_lho nub dang /_nub byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 
[\[201a.6\]]na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing /_ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su 
[\[201a.7\]]smin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad de/_dbyangs rjes su sgrog go_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]yang dag par zhugs zhes bya/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/_gang pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod de/_de sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[201b.2\]]rol du phyin pa la spyod cing /_'dod pas dben/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/_bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis 
[\[201b.3\]]pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/_shin du yangs pa/_mi gnyis pa/_tshad med pa/_gcugs med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_ltod pa med pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa shin du bsgoms pas/_
[\[201b.4\]]'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing /_rnam par spyod do/_/de snying rje dang ldan pa dang /_dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /_btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin du yangs pa/_
[\[201b.5\]]mi gnyis pa/_tshad med pa/_gcugs med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_ltod pa med pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin du bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing rnam 
[\[201b.6\]]par spyod do/_/de tshad med pa 'di dag dang /_gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la/_nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /_tshul dang /_mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin 
[\[201b.7\]]pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_byang chub sems 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/_shin du yangs pa/_mi gnyis pa/_tshad 
[\[202a.2\]]med pa/_gcugs med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_ltod pa med pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin du bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/_/
[\[202a.3\]]snying rje dang ldan pa dang /_dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /_btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/_shin du yangs pa/_mi gnyis pa/_tshad med pa/_gcugs med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_ltod pa med pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin du bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings 
[\[202a.4\]]kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/_/de 'dod pas dben/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang 
[\[202a.5\]]bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye 
[\[202a.6\]]mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen 
[\[202a.7\]]po sngon du 'gro bas/_nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la rjod cing /_'chad pa dang /_ston cing 'grel la/_rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/_de dag gi ro dang /_de 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]dag gi skyon dang /_'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis/_bsam 
[\[202b.2\]]gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing /_rnam par ldang yang /_'di lta ste/_nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/_sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[202b.3\]]dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa mnyams pa'o/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag 
[\[202b.4\]]gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam ste/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir/_chos bstan to snyam du sems shing /_yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_rtog pa dang /_sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[202b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis 
[\[202b.6\]]rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/_brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[202b.7\]]dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing /_rnam par ldang yang /_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]ltung ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/_bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag 
[\[203a.2\]]dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa'i yan lag dang /_bsam gtan gyi yan lag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon 
[\[203a.3\]]pa med pa'i rnam pa rab tu rtog kyang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing /_de dag gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha 
[\[203a.4\]]ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang 
[\[203a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 
[\[203a.6\]]'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[203a.7\]]pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom pa ste/_tshe dang 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /_bdag gis sems can thams cad 
[\[203b.2\]]yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes/_de la gzhol bar byed do/_/snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /_sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /_snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do/_/dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /_bdag nyid kyis sems can 
[\[203b.3\]]thams cad dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so/_/btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing /_sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la 
[\[203b.4\]]spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang /_tshul dang /_mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing /_rnam par ldang yang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs 
[\[203b.5\]]par nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam 
[\[203b.6\]]gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing /_sa gnyis po/_nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/_
[\[203b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i/_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang /_dge 
[\[204a\]]
