[\[225a.5\]]'dzin dang /_gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtogs pas 
[\[225a.6\]]srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mtshan nyid yongs su 
[\[225a.7\]]sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes 
[\[225b.2\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_glog gi 'od 
[\[225b.3\]]ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa 
[\[225b.4\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa 
[\[225b.5\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_nam 
[\[225b.6\]]mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul la spyod pa ste/_'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[225b.7\]]to/_/de la rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin des ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas btab pa lta bur 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de las seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba ste/_'di ni seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/_
[\[226a.2\]]'di ni zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa ste/_'di ni zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos thams cad las shin du 
[\[226a.3\]]'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags pa ste/_'di ni chos thams cad las shin du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_
[\[226a.4\]]ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad mi 'gyur ba'i phyag rgyas btab pa ste/_'di ni chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyi gtsug 
[\[226a.5\]]rnam par lta ba ste/_'di ni spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos kyi dbyings su rtogs par 'gro ba ste/_'di ni chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[226a.6\]]'dzin to/_/de la nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan nges pa 'dzin pa ste/_'di ni nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[226a.7\]]gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig par mi 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]pa ste/_'di ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa ste/_'di ni ting nge 'dzin la rgyal 
[\[226b.2\]]po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa ste/_'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dpung rnam par 
[\[226b.3\]]bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rnam par 'god pa ste/_'di ni dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la 
[\[226b.4\]]gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams 
[\[226b.5\]]cad kyi nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa ste/_'di ni nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]la 
[\[226b.6\]]'jug pa ste/_'di ni tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyogs rnam par lta ba ste/_'di ni phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[226b.7\]]'dzin to/_/de la phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ste/_'di ni phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nyam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyam par mi 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni nyam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 
[\[227a.2\]]'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du zhing khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste/_'di ni chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_
[\[227a.3\]]ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa ste/_'di ni nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dkyil 
[\[227a.4\]]'khor yongs su 'dzin pa ste/_'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ji ltar rgyal mtshan dam pa bzhin/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad las 'phags pa ste/_'di 
[\[227a.5\]]ni rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dbang dam pa thob pa ste/_'di ni dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rgyun 
[\[227a.6\]]gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_rgyun gyi rjes su ma log par yang dag par zhugs pa ste/_'di ni rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 
[\[227a.7\]]'dzin de la gnas shing /_rdul dang dri ma thams cad rab tu spang ba'i dbang du gyur cing /_ji ltar seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin dbang thob pas bsgyings pa lta bu ste/_'di ni seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]'dzin de la gnas shing /_'khor ba'i chos rnams rgyun gcod par byed pa ste/_'di ni snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma rab tu sel ba ste/_
[\[227b.2\]]'di ni nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger byed pa ste/_'di ni rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/
[\[227b.3\]]de la tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos gang yang tshol ba med pa ste/_'di ni tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_
[\[227b.4\]]chos gang yang gnas la rten par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_sems kyang mi 'byung /_sems las byung ba 
[\[227b.5\]]rnams kyang mi rgyu ba ste/_'di ni sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma dri ma med par byed pa ste/_'di ni dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya 
[\[227b.6\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_'od mtha' yas par byed pa ste/_'di ni 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[227b.7\]]de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin 'di thob ma thag tu/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od byed pa ste/_'di ni 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ting nge 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/_'di ni kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dag pa mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa ste/_'di ni dag pa dam 
[\[228a.2\]]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel ba ste/_'di ni 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[228a.3\]]de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma byed pa ste/_'di ni 
[\[228a.4\]]glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad shes pa dang /_zad mi shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[228a.5\]]to/_/de la mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rab tu thob pa ste/_'di ni mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la 
[\[228a.6\]]gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad mi shes par 
[\[228a.7\]]rjes su mthong nas/_rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ba ste/_'di ni zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi g.yo/_mi 'gul/_
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]rab tu mi 'byed/_rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/_'di ni mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni 'jig 
[\[228b.2\]]pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/_'di ni nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[228b.3\]]gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mun pa med par byed pa ste/_'di ni zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad 
[\[228b.4\]]kyi shes rab kyi 'od kyis ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad bsal bar byed pa ste/_'di ni shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig 
[\[228b.5\]]pa bzhi rab tu 'thob pa ste/_'di ni snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/_'di ni snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de 
[\[228b.6\]]la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bya ba rnams byed pa ste/_'di ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 
[\[228b.7\]]'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dpal yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/_'di ni ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang /_yang dag par rjes su mi 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]mthong bar khong du chud par byed pa ste/_'di ni rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_sems mi g.yo/_rnam par mi g.yo/_rnam par mi ldog yongs su yid 'chad par mi 'gyur/_
[\[229a.2\]]nyams su mi bde ba med la/_de la sems zhes bya ba ni 'di yin zhes bya bar sems mi 'byung ba ste/_'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar yang dag par rjes 
[\[229a.3\]]su mthong ba ste/_'di ni kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rin chen mtha' 
[\[229a.4\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad rin chen mtha' ltar kun nas snang ba ste/_'di ni rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[229a.5\]]thams cad phyag rgya med pa'i mthas phyag rgyas btab par nye bar bzung bas phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ti nga nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos gang 
[\[229a.6\]]yang mnyam pa nyid du ma chud pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/_'di ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi dga' ba spong 
[\[229a.7\]]ba ste/_'di ni dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad kyi mun pa sel ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni chos kyis 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad rnam par 'thor ba ste/_'di ni rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya 
[\[229b.2\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_tinga'adzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa ste/_'di ni chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_
[\[229b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob pa ste/_'di ni yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad 
[\[229b.4\]]kyi yi ge gcig kyang dmigs su med pa ste/_'di ni yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dmigs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni dmigs pa gcod pa zhes 
[\[229b.5\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad 'gyur bar mi dmigs pa ste/_'di ni 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la 
[\[229b.6\]]gnas shing /_chos thams cad kyi rnam pa tsam yang dmigs pa med pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_nges pa'i tshig thams cad ni yang dag par dmigs su med cing /_tha snyad 
[\[229b.7\]]la ltos pa tsam mo/_/zhes rtogs par 'jug pa ste/_'di ni ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin de thams cad kyi gnas dmigs pa med pa ste/_'di ni gnas med par spyod pa 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba ste/_'di ni rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la spyod pa dang 
[\[230a.2\]]ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 
[\[230a.3\]]'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad g.yo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/_'di ni g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams 
[\[230a.4\]]cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/_'di ni yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yon 
[\[230a.5\]]tan gyi tshogs rjes su 'thob pa ste/_'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sems mi 'jug pa ste/_'di ni sems med par 
[\[230a.6\]]gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/_'di ni dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing 
[\[230a.7\]]gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi byang chub kyi yan lag rab tu 'thob pa ste/_'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spobs pa mtha' yas pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/_'di ni spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la mi mnyam pa dang 
[\[230b.2\]]mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/_'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas 
[\[230b.3\]]shing khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/_'di ni chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams 
[\[230b.4\]]cad kyi rgyud mthong ba ste/_'di ni yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_chos thams cad la nem nur rnam par sel ba rab tu 'thob 
[\[230b.5\]]pa ste/_'di ni nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad kyi gnas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[230b.6\]]ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos gang yang gnyis su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam pa mngon par 
[\[230b.7\]]sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam pa gcig tu 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam pa 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[231a.2\]]ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad gnyis su med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/_'di ni rnam pa 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[231a.3\]]'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes la zhugs nas/_de la zhugs pa'i phyir khong du mi chud pa gang yang med pa ste/_'di ni rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la brda 
[\[231a.4\]]dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi brda dang sgra la 'jug pa ste/_'di ni brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_
[\[231a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge dang bral bar rjes su mthong ba ste/_'di ni sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams 
[\[231a.6\]]cad kyi gzi brjid kyis lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger byed pa ste/_'di ni sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yongs su 
[\[231a.7\]]dag par 'gyur bar byed pa ste/_'di ni mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par dmigs pa med par yang dag par 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]rjes su mthong ba ste/_/'di ni mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 
[\[231b.2\]]'gyur ba ste/_'di ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bde ba 
[\[231b.3\]]dang /_sdug bsngal yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_
[\[231b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad du rung bar yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba ste/_'di ni zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_gzungs thams cad yongs su 
[\[231b.5\]]'dzin pa ste/_'di ni gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag pa dang log par yang dag 
[\[231b.6\]]par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_
[\[231b.7\]]ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'gal ba dang 'gog pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'thun pa dang 'gal ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni 'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_
[\[232a.2\]]ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mi dmigs pa ste/_'di ni 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams 
[\[232a.3\]]cad kyi snying po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'di lta ste/_dper na zla ba 
[\[232a.4\]]nya ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_dag cing gsal ba'i 'od kyis sems can gyi ris 
[\[232a.5\]]snang bar byas shing /_mun pa mun nag gi tsha ba gdug pa sel bar byed pa ste/_'di ni glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyan chen po dang ldan 
[\[232a.6\]]par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/_'di ni rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes 
[\[232a.7\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'khrug pa yang mi dmigs/_rtse gcig kyang mi dmigs pa ste/_'di ni ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin dang chos thams cad rdul can dang /_rdul dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ste/_'di ni rdul med cing rdul dang 
[\[232b.2\]]bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyon mongs pa med par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni nyon mongs pa med par 
[\[232b.3\]]yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag 
[\[232b.4\]]par gzhol ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_
[\[232b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun gzhi nye bar mi dmigs pa ste/_'di ni gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la de bzhin nyid la gnas shing /_sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 
[\[232b.6\]]'dzin thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pa ste/_'di ni de bzhin nyid la gnas shing /_sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[232b.7\]]thams cad kyi lus mi dmigs pa ste/_'di ni lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]kyi ngag gi las mi dmigs pa ste/_'di ni ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas/_rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_
[\[233a.2\]]ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /_chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas/_rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa 'thob pa ste/_'di ni nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas/_rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/_rab 'byor 'di ni byang 
[\[233a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u brgyad pa'o//_//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[233a.4\]]theg pa chen po 'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/_rab 
[\[233a.5\]]'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing 
[\[233a.6\]]rnam par spyod kyang /_lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go_/phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_
[\[233a.7\]]yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /_rnam par spyod kyang /_lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go_/phyi nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /_lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go_/nang gi tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /_
[\[233b.2\]]brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten kyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /_chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go_/phyi'i tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos 
[\[233b.3\]]la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang /_chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par 
[\[233b.4\]]mi rtog go_/phyi nang gi tshor ba dang /_sems dang /_chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod 
[\[233b.5\]]kyang /_chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go_/rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod pa yin zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gro na 'gro'o 
[\[233b.6\]]zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/'greng na 'greng ngo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/'dug na 'dug go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/nyal na nyal lo zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_de'i lus nyams bde ba 'am/_mi bde yang rung /_lus ji lta ji ltar gnas pa/_de lta de ltar des 
[\[233b.7\]]rab tu shes so/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can/_shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_lus kyi rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/_/de 'gro 'am 'ong yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_
[\[234a.2\]]lta'am/_rnam par lta yang /_shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_bskum 'am/_brkyang yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_sbyar ma dang /_lhung bzed 'chang zhing spyod kyang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_zos pa dang /_'chos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_myangs pa la yang shes bzhin du 
[\[234a.3\]]spyod pa yin/_nyal ba dang /_gnyid kyi mya myo bsal ba yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/_'gro ba dang /_'ong ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_gnyid kyis log pa dang /_ma log pa dang /_smra ba dang /_mi smra ba dang /_nang du yang dag 'jog la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa 
[\[234a.4\]]yin te/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig 
[\[234a.5\]]rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu na yang /_dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu'o/_/zhes bya 
[\[234a.6\]]bar rab tu shes so/_/dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu na yang /_dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs nang du ring du rgyu na yang /_dbugs nang du ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs phyir ring du rgyu na yang /_dbugs phyir ring du rgyu'o zhes bya 
[\[234a.7\]]bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs nang du thung du rgyu na yang /_dbugs nang du thung du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs phyir thung du rgyu na yang /_dbugs phyir thung du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes ste/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na/_rdza mkhan 'khor lo bskor ba 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]'am/_rdza mkhan 'khor lo bskor ba'i mchan bu mkhas pa ni ring du bskor na ring du bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/thung du bskor na thung du bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[234b.2\]]du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_dran par dbugs nang du rgyus na yang /_dran par dbugs nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dran par dbugs phyir rgyus na yang /_dran par dbugs phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs ring du nang du rgyus na yang /_dbugs 
[\[234b.3\]]ring du nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs ring du phyir rgyus na yang /_dbugs ring du phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs thung du nang du rgyus na yang /_dbugs thung du nang du rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/dbugs thung du phyir rgyus na 
[\[234b.4\]]yang /_dbugs thung du phyir rgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes 
[\[234b.5\]]bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus 'di la sa'i 
[\[234b.6\]]khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams kyang yod do/_/zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab du rtog ste/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na/_ba lang gi shen pa'am/_ba lang gi shen pa'i mchan bu mkhas pas/_
[\[234b.7\]]mtshon rnon po thogs te/_ba lang bsad cing bag bzhir gshegs te/_so sor phye nas 'greng ngam 'dug ste/_de la rab tu rtog pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yang /_lus 'di la sa'i khams 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[235a.2\]]spyod cing /_'greng ngam 'dug ste/_nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/
[\[235a.3\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan cad/_skra dang /_klad pa man cad/_sen mo dang /_spu dang /_pags pa yan cad/_mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis 
[\[235a.4\]]gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/_lus 'di la skra dang /_spu dang /_sen mo dang /_pags pa dang /_glog pa dang /_sha dang /_chu ba dang /_khrag dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang dang /_snying dang /_mkhal ma dang /_mchin pa dang /_glo ba dang /_mtsher pa dang /_long ka dang /_
[\[235a.5\]]rgyu ma dang /_gnye ma dang /_nang grol dang /_gcin dang /_phyi sa dang /_mchi ma dang /_rngul dang /_tshil dang /_snabs dang /_ngar snabs dang /_rnag dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_chu ser dang /_kha chu dang /_dri ma dang /_klad pa dang /_klad rgyas dang /_rngu ma dang /_rna spabs 
[\[235a.6\]]dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab du rtog ste/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_chun pa'i sgye snod til dang /_yungs kar dang /_sran chung dang /_bal sran dang /_nas dang /_gro dang /_'bras dang /_'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba/_mig dang ldan pa'i mi zhig 
[\[235a.7\]]gis phye ste bltas na/_'di ni til lo/_/'di ni yungs kar ro/_/'di ni sran chung ngo /_/'di ni bal sran no/_/'di ni nas so/_/'di ni gro'o/_/'di ni 'bras so/_/'di dag ni de ma yin pa'i 'bru gzhan no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan cad/_skra dang /_spyi bo man cad/_sen mo dang /_spu dang /_pags pa yan chad/_mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/_lus 'di la skra dang /_spu dang /_sen mo dang 
[\[235b.2\]]pags pa dang /_glog pa dang /_sha dang /_chu ba dang /_khrag dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang dang /_snying dang /_mkhal ma dang /_mchin pa dang /_glo ba dang /_mtsher pa dang /_long ka dang /_rgyu ma dang /_gnye ma dang /_nang grol dang /_gcin dang /_phyi sa dang /_mchi ma dang /_rngul dang /_tshil dang /_
[\[235b.3\]]snabs dang /_ngar snabs dang /_rnag dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_chu ser dang /_kha chu dang /_dri ma dang /_klad pa dang /_klad rgyas dang /_rngu ma dang /_rna spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog go_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[235b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal 
[\[235b.5\]]cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod na yod pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dur khrod du bor ba/_ro'i mal du bsnyal ba/_shi nas zhag gcig lon pa 'am/_shi nas zhag 
[\[235b.6\]]gnyis lon pa 'am/_shi nas zhag gsum lon pa 'am/_shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa 'am/_shi nas zhag lnga lon pa 'am/_rnam par bam pa 'am/_rnam par sngos pa 'am/_rnam par rnags pa 'am/_rnam par gzhigs pa 'am/_rnam par zos pa 'am/_rnam par 'thor ba mthong na/_de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang 
[\[235b.7\]]de dang sbyor te/_lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can/_'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar sbyor ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de mi 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[236a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro shi nas zhag drug lon pa'am/_shi nas zhag bdun lon pa bya rog gam/_khwa'am/_'ol ba'am/_bya rgod ngam/_spyang ki 'am/_wa 'am/_khyi 'am/_de ma yin pa'i srog 
[\[236a.3\]]chags kyi rigs sna tshogs kyis bza' ba mthong ba de'i tshe de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/_lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can/_'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_chos nyid 'di lta bu las ma 'das so/_/zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang 
[\[236a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi 
[\[236a.5\]]bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro rnam par zos pa/_mi gtsang ba/_rnags pa/_rnam par srungs pa mthong ba de'i tshe/_
[\[236a.6\]]lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/_lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can/_'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o/_/zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[236a.7\]]phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod kyi rus pa/_keng rus sha ra ri dang /_khrag ra ri chags pa/_rgyus pas brang breng du 'brel pa mthong ba de'i tshe/_de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/_lus 
[\[236b.2\]]'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can/_'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de mi 
[\[236b.3\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyad do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[236b.4\]]dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus sha dang /_khrag med pa/_rgyus pa'i gzungs med pa/_dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/_de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/_lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di 
[\[236b.5\]]lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o/_/zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su 
[\[236b.6\]]lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_
[\[236b.7\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod kyi rus pa/_keng rus gzungs med pa/_gyes pa/_dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa/_sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong ba de'i tshe/_de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/_lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can/_'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 
[\[237a.2\]]pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 
[\[237a.3\]]'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod kyi rus pa sa la/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rnam par 'thor ba/_rkang pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/_byin pa'i rus pa rnams 
[\[237a.4\]]kyang gzhan du 'thor/_brla'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/_dpyi'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/_tshigs pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/_rtsib ma'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/_mjing pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/_
[\[237a.5\]]mgo'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor ba mthong na/_de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/_lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can/_'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_chos nyid 'di lta bu las ma 'das pa'o/_/zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go_/rab 'byor de ltar na 
[\[237a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems 
[\[237a.7\]]dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa/_rlung dang nyi mas gdungs pa/_dung gi mdog ltar 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/_de lus 'di nyid kyang de dang nye bar sbyor te/_lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can te/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[237b.2\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor 
[\[237b.3\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa/_rab rib snang ba/_sngon por gyur pa/_thi ba'i mdog ltar gyur pa/_zegs pa/_brul ba/_sa'i rdul dang 'dren 'dren du gyur 
[\[237b.4\]]pa mthong ba de'i tshe/_de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/_lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can/_'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/_'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[237b.5\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta/_phyi'i lus dang /_phyi nang gi lus 'di la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan 
[\[237b.6\]]pas/_'jig rten gyi chags sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/nang gi tshor ba dang /_phyi'i tshor ba dang /_phyi nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta/_nang gi sems dang /_phyi'i sems dang /_phyi nang gi 
[\[237b.7\]]sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta/_nang gi chos dang /_phyi'i chos dang /_phyi nang gi chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing /_brtson 'grus can/_shes bzhin dang ldan pa/_dran pa dang ldan pas/_'jig rten gyi chags 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]sems dang /_yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/_/rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 
[\[238a.2\]]'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos par skyed cing 
[\[238a.3\]]rtsol lo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems kyi mthu skyed do/_/yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/_/sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems kyi mthu 
[\[238a.4\]]skyed do/_/yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/_/dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems kyi mthu skyed do/_/yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/_/dge 
[\[238a.5\]]ba'i chos skyes pa'i rnams gnas pa dang /_phyir zhing bsgom pa dang /_nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_sems kyi mthu skyed do/_/yang dag par 
[\[238a.6\]]smon lam 'debs te/_/rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 
[\[238a.7\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang /_ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo/_/brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo/_/sems kyi ting nge 
[\[238b.2\]]'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo/_/dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la 
[\[238b.3\]]gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang 
[\[238b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar dbang po lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi 
[\[238b.5\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar stobs lnga ste/_/lnga gang zhe na/_dad pa'i stobs dang /_brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[238b.6\]]stobs dang /_dran pa'i stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /_shes rab kyi stobs te/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[238b.7\]]dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/_bdun gang zhe na/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas/_yongs su grub pa 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/_/chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan 
[\[239a.2\]]lag dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas/_yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[239a.3\]]sgom ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_
[\[239a.4\]]yang dag pa'i lta ba dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas/_yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/_/yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi 
[\[239a.5\]]mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas/_yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[239a.6\]]gyis sgom ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar/_ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[239a.7\]]mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid du rtog pa'i tshe/_sems gnas pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/_'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]'dzin ces bya'o/_/de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med par rtog pa'i tshe/_sems gnas pa mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/_'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 
[\[239b.2\]]'dzin gang zhe na/_chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med do/_/zhes mngon bar 'du mi byed pa'i tshe/_sems gnas pa smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/_'di ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag la zhum pa med 
[\[239b.3\]]par dran par bya ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar shes pa bcu gcig 
[\[239b.4\]]ste/_bcu gcig gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa dang /_lam shes pa dang /_zad pa shes pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa dang /_chos shes pa dang /_rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /_kun rdzob shes pa dang /_'dris 
[\[239b.5\]]pa shes pa dang /_sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o/_/de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pa'o/_/de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/_kun 'byung ba spong bar shes pa'o/_/de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal 'gog par shes 
[\[239b.6\]]pa'o/_/de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o/_/de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug zad par shes pa'o/_/de la mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/_srid pa'i rgyud skye ba med par 
[\[239b.7\]]shes pa'o/_/de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/_phung po lnga sgyu mar yongs su rtogs shing shes pa'o/_/de la rjes su rtogs pa shes pa gang zhe na/_skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa'o/_/de la kun rdzob shes pa 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]gang zhe na/_sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi sems sems kyis shes pa'o/_/de la 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/_gang gis lam shes pa dang /_yongs su byang ba shes pa'o/_/de la sgra ji bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/_de bzhin 
[\[240a.2\]]gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen 
[\[240a.3\]]po ni/_'di ltar dbang po gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba'i dbang po dang /_yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang /_yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po'o/_/de la yongs su ma shes par yongs su shes 
[\[240a.4\]]par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba'i dbang po gang zhe na/_slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po yongs su snang bar ma gyur 
[\[240a.5\]]pa 'di ni/_yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po'o/_/de la yongs su shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/_gang zag slob pa yongs su shes par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_
[\[240a.6\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po ste/_'di ni yongs su shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/_/de la yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/_gang zag mi slob pa dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_
[\[240a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang mi 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_rtog pa dang bcas shing 
[\[240b.2\]]dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[240b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/_bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas pa 'di ni/_rtog pa dang 
[\[240b.4\]]bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar te/_'di ni rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/de la rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[240b.5\]]cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min 
[\[240b.6\]]skye mched dang /_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ste/_'di ni mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[240b.7\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar rjes su dran pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]dran pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lha rjes su dran pa dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /_skye ba rjes su dran pa dang /_'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /_lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi 
[\[241a.2\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di lta ste/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med 
[\[241a.3\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/_de la bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[241a.4\]]'dod pas dben/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar 
[\[241a.5\]]zhi nas/_nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/_rtog pa med pa/_dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/_bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral 
[\[241a.6\]]bas dran pa dang ldan zhing /_shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la/_'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/_bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/_btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye 
[\[241a.7\]]bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing /_yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/_bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa/_btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi ba la mi 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/_de dag ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'o/_/de la tshad med pa bzhi gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_byams pa dang ldan 
[\[241b.2\]]pa'i sems rgya chen po shin du yangs pa/_mi gnyis pa/_tshad med pa/_gcugs med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_ltod pa med pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin du bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu 
[\[241b.3\]]rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing /_mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod do/_/snying rje dang ldan pa dang /_dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /_btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin du yangs pa/_mi gnyis pa/_tshad med pa/_gcugs med pa/_gnod pa 
[\[241b.4\]]med pa/_ltod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa/_shin du bsgoms pas/_'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/_mos par byas shing /_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod de/_de dag ni tshad 
[\[241b.5\]]med pa bzhi'o/_/de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_
[\[241b.6\]]thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las 
[\[241b.7\]]yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms 
[\[242a.2\]]par 'jug pa bzhi'o/_/de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/_gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar ba dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/_phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni/_rnam par thar pa 
[\[242a.3\]]gnyis pa'o/_/bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba gsum pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' 
[\[242a.4\]]yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs 
[\[242a.5\]]te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 
[\[242a.6\]]'das te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar 
[\[242a.7\]]bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/_/de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'dod pas dben/_
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas pa/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas/_nang yongs su dang 
[\[242b.2\]]ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/_rtog pa med pa/_dpyod pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/_bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_dran pa dang ldan zhing shes 
[\[242b.3\]]bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la/_'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/_btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de bde ba 
[\[242b.4\]]yang spangs/_sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /_yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/_bde ba yang med/_sdug bsngal ba yang med pa/_btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa/_bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa 
[\[242b.5\]]thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/_thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas 
[\[242b.6\]]so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las 
[\[242b.7\]]yang dag par 'das te/_cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/_/
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes dang /_tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/_de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[243a.2\]]par 'jug pa dgu'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[243a.3\]]pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las dang /_las yongs 
[\[243a.4\]]su len pa'i rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang /_rgyu'i rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams ni sna tshogs can te/_'jig rten gyi khams ni du ma pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sems can 
[\[243a.5\]]gzhan dang /_gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang /_mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/sems can gzhan yang /_gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang /_tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/kun du 'gro 
[\[243a.6\]]ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba rnam 
[\[243a.7\]]par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/de rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/_tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/_rnam pa dang bcas/_sa mal dang bcas/_gtan tshigs dang bcas pa'i bar du/_rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]su dran no/_/de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba dag kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/zag pa zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba/_zag pa med pa/_rang gi 
[\[243b.2\]]mngon par shes pas mngon par byas te/_nye bar bsgrubs shing rnam par spyod do/_/bdag gi skye ba ni zad do/_/bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do/_/bya ba ni byas so/_/rnam pa 'di lta bu gzhan ni med do zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[243b.3\]]gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes 
[\[243b.4\]]dam bcas na/_de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang 
[\[243b.5\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i 
[\[243b.6\]]sgra bsgrag go_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa/_bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam 
[\[243b.7\]]bcas na/_de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to/_/zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am gzhan su yang rung ste 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag 
[\[244a.2\]]go_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa/_bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa 
[\[244a.3\]]de dag la bstan nas/_bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med de/_de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang 
[\[244a.4\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra 
[\[244a.5\]]bsgrag go_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa/_bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags 
[\[244a.6\]]pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba/_de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na/_sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de lta bu'i gnas med do/_/de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am/_
[\[244a.7\]]lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /_bag tsha ba med 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]pa thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyad de/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze 'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs 
[\[244b.2\]]pa 'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/
[\[244b.3\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig so 
[\[244b.4\]]so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[244b.5\]]theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad de/[ {]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad gang zhe na/_gang gi nam la de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_gang gi nam la lha dang bcas 
[\[244b.6\]]pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa/_sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis rjes su bstan te/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 
[\[244b.7\]]'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i bar du/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o/_/ca co mi mnga'o/_/dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o/_/thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]mnga'o/_/ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o/_/mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/
[\[245a.2\]]shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/_/sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/_ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/
[\[245a.3\]]gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/_ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/_ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go_/ma 
[\[245a.4\]]'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go_/da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa ste/_rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg 
[\[245a.5\]]pa chen po'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/_'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams te/_de yang yi ge mnyam pa nyid dang /_brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_yi ge'i sgo dang /_yi ge la 'jug pa ste/_de la yi ge'i sgo dang /_
