[\[245a.6\]]yi ge la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_a zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa stong pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/tsa zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mi dmigs 
[\[245a.7\]]pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad 'chi 'pho dang skye ba med pas/_chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/na zhes bya ba ni ming dang bral zhing /_ming gi rang bzhin ma thob ma stor bas/_chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/lA zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing /_srid pa'i 'khri shing dang 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]rgyu dang /_rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/dA zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang dul ba'i gnas su yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/bA zhes bya ba ni bcings pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/Ta zhes bya ba ni dkrugs ma dang 
[\[245b.2\]]bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa mi dmigs pas chags par mi 'gyur ro/_/'ching bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ba zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam dang sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ta 
[\[245b.3\]]zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ya zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sta zhes bya ba ni khengs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ka zhes 
[\[245b.4\]]bya ba ni byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pas/_mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ma zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/
[\[245b.5\]]ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/tha zhes bya ba ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/dzA zhes bya ba ni skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/shwa zhes bya ba ni dbugs dmigs su med pa'i 
[\[245b.6\]]phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/kha zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dmigs su med pa'i 
[\[245b.7\]]phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/k+Sha zhes bya ba ni zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sta zhes bya ba ni bstod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/dz+nya zhes bya ba ni ye shes mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/rta zhes bya 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]ba ni nyon mongs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/b+ha zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/tsha zhes bya ba ni mdog mi 
[\[246a.2\]]dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/sma zhes bya ba ni dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/hwa zhes bya ba ni bod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/t+sa zhes bya ba ni mos pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/
[\[246a.3\]]g+ha zhes bya ba ni stug po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/Tha zhes bya ba ni bsgrub pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/Na zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa med pas gang yang 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med de/_gnas pa med cing 'dug pa med la/_
[\[246a.4\]]nyal bar 'gyur ba med pas/_rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/pha zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/ska zhes bya ba ni phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/yas zhes 
[\[246a.5\]]bya ba ni mi bde ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/Ta zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa dang /_mthar thug par gnas par 'chi 'pho med cing /_skye ba med 
[\[246a.6\]]pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/D+ha zhes bya ba ni g.yog pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/_de yan cad ni yi ge'i tha snyad med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar gang la yang gang gis tha snyad du bya ba dang /_gang gis brjod pa 
[\[246a.7\]]dang /_gang gis bstan pa dang /_gang bri ba dang /_gang snang ba dang /_gang klag par bya ba de lta bu'i ming gang yang med do/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad ni dper na/_nam mkha' bzhin du khong du chud par bya ste/_rab 'byor 'di ni gzungs 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]kyi sgo la 'jug pa/_a la sogs pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa'o/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis/_a la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i yi ge la mkhas par bya ba 'di yongs su shes na/_de ni sgra gang la yang chags par mi 'gyur 
[\[246b.2\]]zhing /_thams cad chos nyid kyis yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur te/_sgra shes par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang gis/_a la sogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya 'di dang /_a la sogs pa'i yi ge la 
[\[246b.3\]]'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag thos te/_thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed cing /_gzhan la yang tshul dang ldan pa'i blos ston na/_de la legs pa nyi shu yod par shes par bya'o/_/nyi shu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[246b.4\]]dran pa dang ldan/_blo gros dang ldan/_rtogs pa dang ldan/_blo dang ldan/_dga' ba dang ldan/_ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan/_spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_gzungs kyi sgo 'di yang nyon mongs pa med par 'thob cing /_the tshom med par 'gyur la/_gzhan las sgra'i 
[\[246b.5\]]ngag snyan pa thos kyang chags par 'gyur ba med cing /_zhe gcod pa'i tshig thos kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur bas/_mtho ba med cing dma' ba med de/_tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_sgra la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_phung po la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[246b.6\]]khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_bden pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas te/_rgyu la mkhas shing rkyen la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_chos nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[246b.7\]]dbang po rab dang tha ma shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_lha'i rna ba'i shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_sngon gyi 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]gnas rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_zag pa zad pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa bstan pa shes par bya ba 
[\[247a.2\]]mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_'gro ba la mkhas shing ldog pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_spyod lam la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_khrel yod pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa la mkhas pa yang 'thob par 'gyur te/_rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo a la sogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa 
[\[247a.3\]]'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/_le'u dgu pa'o//_//rab 'byor gang yang khyod 'di skad du ji ltar na/_byang chub 
[\[247a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod cing /_sa nas sar 'phar te/_rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[247a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod cing /_sa nas sar 'phar ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad 'pho ba med pas/_chos gang yang 'ong ba med cing /_'gro ba med de/_'pho ba'am nye bar 'pho ba med do/_/'on kyang chos thams cad kyis gang yin 
[\[247a.6\]]pa de la rlom sems su byed pa 'am/_sems pa med par sa yongs su sbyong ba yang mi byed pa ma yin la sa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa yongs su sbyong ba gang zhe na/_rab 'byor sa dang po la gnas pa'i 
[\[247a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa yongs su sbyang ba bcu po 'di dag bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /_mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang zhing /_
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba dang /_sbyin pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_len pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_des rlom sems su mi bya ba'i phyir/_dge ba'i bshes 
[\[247b.2\]]gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_khyim mi dmigs pa'i phyir yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_sangs 
[\[247b.3\]]rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /_chos kyi rnam pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_chos kyi yang dag pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_nga rgyal dang khengs pa bsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang /_tshig mi dmigs pa'i phyir bden pa'i 
[\[247b.4\]]tshig yongs su sbyang ba ste/_rab 'byor yongs su sbyang ba bcu po de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sa dang po la gnas pas bya ba dag go_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa gnyis pa la gnas pas/_
[\[247b.5\]]chos brgyad po 'di dag yang dang yang yid la bya zhing /_de dag la nan tan du bya'o/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /_byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba dang /_bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa dang /_rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar 
[\[247b.6\]]bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba dang /_bla ma la bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba dang /_pha rol du phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba ste/_rab 'byor chos brgyad po de dag ni/_byang chub 
[\[247b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas/_yang dang yang yid la bya zhing /_de dag la nan tan du bya ba dag go_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sa gsum pa la gnas pas/_chos lnga la gnas 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]par bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mang du thos pas mi ngoms shing /_de la yang yi ge la mngon par ma zhen pa dang /_zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed cing /_des kyang rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[248a.2\]]kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo yang /_des rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba dang /_dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med cing /_des kyang rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba dang /_ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas 
[\[248a.3\]]kyang /_des rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba ste/_rab 'byor chos lnga po de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas par bya ba dag go_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas 
[\[248a.4\]]pas/_chos bcu po 'di dag yongs su blangs shing gnas par bya ste/_de dag yongs su btang bar mi bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dgon pa la gnas pa dang /_'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi btang ba dang /_
[\[248a.5\]]bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba dang /_'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_rdzas thams cad yongs su btang ba dang /_sems zhum pa med pa dang /_dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med pa ste/_
[\[248a.6\]]rab 'byor chos bcu po de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas/_yongs su gtang bar mi bya zhing /_yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba dag go_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[248a.7\]]po sa lnga pa la gnas pas/_chos drug po 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya ste/_drug gang zhe na/_'di ltar khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_dge slong ma dang bsten pa dang /_rigs la ser sna byed pa dang /_'du 'dzi'i gnas dang /_gnod sems dang /_
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]bdag bstod cing gzhan smod pa ste/_chos drug po de dag ni yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/yang chos brgyad yongs su spang bar bya ste/_'di ltar mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang khengs pa dang /_phyin ci log 
[\[248b.2\]]rnams dang /_tho tsam dang 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug nyam rang su gzhag pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/chos brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan 
[\[248b.3\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug pa la gnas pas/_chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug go_/gzhan yang chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ste/_drug gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar 
[\[248b.4\]]bya'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/sred pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/slong mo pa mthong na zhum pa med par bya ste/_zhum pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid mi 
[\[248b.5\]]bde bar mi bya ste/_yid mi bde ba yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/slongs mo pa mthong na slongs mo pas 'khrug par mi bya ste/_'khrug pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor chos drug po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug 
[\[248b.6\]]pa la gnas pas yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu mi bya ste/_nyi shu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o/_/sems can du 'dzin pa dang /_srog tu 
[\[248b.7\]]'dzin pa dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang /_chad par 'dzin pa dang /_rtag par 'dzin pa dang /_mtshan ma'i 'du shes dang /_rgyur lta ba dang /_ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags pa dang /_phung po la mngon par chags pa dang /_khams la mngon par chags pa dang /_
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]skye mched la mngon par chags pa dang /_khams gsum la mngon par chags pa dang /_khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa dang /_khams gsum la rten pa dang /_khams gsum la gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon 
[\[249a.2\]]par chags pa dang /_chos la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /_dge 'dun la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /_tshul khrims la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /_chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par 'gyur ba dang /_stong pa nyid dang 'gal 
[\[249a.3\]]ba ste/_rab 'byor chos nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas mi bya'o des chos nyi shu po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_nyi shu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste stong pa nyid rdzogs par bya ba dang /_mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba 
[\[249a.4\]]dang /_smon pa med pa shes par bya ba dang /_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba dang /_sems can de dag la brnyas par mi bya ba dang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du lta ba yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs shing /_
[\[249a.5\]]des rlom sems su mi bya ba dang /_mi skye ba la bzod pa dang /_mi skye ba shes pa dang /_chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa dang /_rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba dang /_lta ba rnam par zlog pa dang /_nyon mongs pa rnam par zlog pa dang /_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong 
[\[249a.6\]]gis dang /_dul ba'i sems dang /_zhi ba'i sems dang /_thogs pa med pa dang /_byams pa'i skabs shes pa dang /_gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba ste/_rab 'byor chos nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas yongs 
[\[249a.7\]]su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas/_chos bzhi po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud par bya ba dang /_mngon par shes pas 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]rnam par rtse ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag yongs su bsgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtag pa ste/_rab 'byor chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub 
[\[249b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[249b.3\]]dbang po rab dang /_tha ma shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dang yang mnyam par gzhag pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus yongs su bsgrub pa'i 
[\[249b.4\]]phyir/_ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa ste/_rab 'byor chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[249b.5\]]sa dgu pa la gnas pas/_chos bcu gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_bcu gnyis gang zhe na/_'di ltar smon lam mtha' yas pa yongs su bzung ste/_ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[249b.6\]]dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes pa dang /_ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_
[\[249b.7\]]rgyud phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rus phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_yon tan thams cad yongs 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/_rab 'byor chos bcu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/rab 'byor sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[250a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas 
[\[250a.3\]]pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa yongs su sbyang ba gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_dge ba'i 
[\[250a.4\]]rtsa ba mang po yongs su dag par sdud pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su 
[\[250a.5\]]sbyang ba gang zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_tshad med pa bzhi po byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can 
[\[250a.6\]]thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med par sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ste/_'di ni byang chub 
[\[250a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]bskul ba dang /_gzhog pa dang /_rab tu gzhog par byed pa de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la bsten pa dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang bsti stang du bya ba ste/_
[\[250b.2\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems 
[\[250b.3\]]bskyed pas chos tshol zhing /_nyan thos kyis dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba 
[\[250b.4\]]yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_tshe rabs thams cad du 'du 'dzi med par 'byung zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung yang /_de la bar chad byed pa gang yang med pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su 
[\[250b.5\]]sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong nas/_nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/_sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang nam 
[\[250b.6\]]yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems 
[\[250b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/_sems can rnams la chos ston cing /_thog mar yang dge_/bar du yang dge_/tha mar yang dge_/yi ge bzang po/_don bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba/_tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'di lta ste/_mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_'di ltar 'das 
[\[251a.2\]]pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin du rgyas pa dang /_rmad du byung ba dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_gtan la phab par bstan pa dag yang dag par ston pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/
[\[251a.3\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang /_khengs pa bsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_nga rgyal dang khengs pa ji ltar bsal ba des/_nam yang rigs dma' bar mi skye ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang 
[\[251a.4\]]khengs pa bsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ji 
[\[251a.5\]]skad du smras pa de ltar byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pa'i yongs su sbyang ba bcu'o/_/rab 'byor 
[\[251a.6\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yid la mi byed cing /_de ma yin pa'i tshul khrims ngan par byed pa dang /_byang 
[\[251a.7\]]chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba'i chos gzhan dag kyang yid la mi byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba gang zhe na/_
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_phan pa chung ngu zhig byas kyang 'khor ba zad kyi bar du chud mi gzon na mang po lta ci smos te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing 
[\[251b.2\]]drin du gzo ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing /_'tshe ba med pa'i sems te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[251b.3\]]bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[251b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba gang zhe na/_'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[251b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_'di snyam du 
[\[251b.6\]]sems shing bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal bar gnas par bya ste/_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bkod kyi bar du de dag du gtub cing gshegs pa dang /_brdung zhing btso ba dang /_bsreg pa la sogs 
[\[251b.7\]]pa nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam nas/_de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don du spro zhing skyo ba med pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]zhing /_dad pas gus par bya ba gang zhe na/_'di ltar bla ma rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes su byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma la bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[252a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol du phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_las gzhan med par sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_las gzhan med par pha rol du phyin pa rnams yongs su tshol ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[252a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol du phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/_phyogs 
[\[252a.4\]]bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gang ci bstan pa de dag thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya'o/_/zhes mi ngoms pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[252a.5\]]chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pa'i tshe/_chos kyi sbyin pa des chung ngu na byang chub tu yang re ba med pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[252a.6\]]zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang gis/_sangs rgyas 
[\[252a.7\]]kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /_bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyi zhing yongs su spyod pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]yongs su bsngo ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa gang zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nye bar brten na/_sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 
[\[252b.2\]]dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar rton cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du/_nam yang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa'o/_/
[\[252b.3\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la smod pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa'o/_/
[\[252b.4\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtong ba gang zhe na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'da' ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang ba'o/_/
[\[252b.5\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub la yang 'dod pa mi skyed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems 
[\[252b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa gang zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs 
[\[252b.7\]]pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi gtang ba gang zhe na/_'di ltar chos zab mo rnams la rtogs par gzhog pa'i bzod pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi gtang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ba gang zhe na/_bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[253a.2\]]chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na/_'dod pa'i sems mi skyed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i 
[\[253a.3\]]sems bskyed pa gang zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas 
[\[253a.4\]]thams cad yongs su gtang ba gang zhe na/_phyi nang gi chos thams cad la 'dzin pa med pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su gtang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum 
[\[253a.5\]]pa med pa gang zhe na/_rnam par shes pa gnas pa la/_de'i sems mi gnas pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med pa gang zhe 
[\[253a.6\]]na/_dngos po thams cad yid la mi byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/_
[\[253a.7\]]'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing rdzus te skye ba dang /_mgo bregs shing /_ngur smrig gi gos bgo ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/_/de la byang chub 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/_dge slong ma dang se gol gtogs pa tsam du yang lhan cig mi gnas shing /_de'i rgyus yongs su skom pa'i sems mi skyed de/_de'i rgyus gos 'thob par mi byed pa 'di ni/_
[\[253b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[253b.3\]]'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/_gang bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i rnam pa bsgrub par bya ba de dang /_sems can 'di dag rang rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur na/_de la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni/_
[\[253b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[253b.5\]]po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas pas/_nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas yod pa'am/_de dang ldan pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/_de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[253b.6\]]gnas par mi bya ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/_gnod sems dang /_'tshe ba'i 
[\[253b.7\]]sems kyi skabs mi 'byed cing /_thab mo'i sems sam/_rtsod pa'i sems kyi go mi 'byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]su spang ba gang zhe na/_nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan 
[\[254a.2\]]smod pa yongs su spong ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[254a.3\]]dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/_de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la yang bar du gcod na/_'phags pa'i lam la lta ci smos te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la lta smos kyang ci dgos 
[\[254a.4\]]kyis/_spang bar bya'o zhes spong ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang 
[\[254a.5\]]bar bya ba yin zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med na/_gang gis nga rgyal du 'gyur ba'i lhag pa lta ci smos shes nga rgyal du mi byed pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su 
[\[254a.6\]]spang bar bya ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des gang la khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_'di ni byang chub 
[\[254a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/_dngos por mi dmigs pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]po'i phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba yin zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang gti mug yang 
[\[254b.2\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba'o/_/de las drug la chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/_'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug ste/_sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[254b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug 
[\[254b.4\]]po 'di dag la gnas te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams shes par bya ba'i rgya mtsho lnga'i pha rol du phyin par gyur to/_/phyin to/_/phyin par 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung 
[\[254b.5\]]ba dang /_brjod du med pa dang /_'dus ma byas te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/_'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi 
[\[254b.6\]]lam ma yin pas/_nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas srid pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam 
[\[254b.7\]]ma yin pas slong mo ba mthong na sems zhum pa mi bskyed do/_/'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid mi bde bar mi bya'o/_/'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas thog ma sems bskyed nas kha za yag gi sems su mi bya'i/_sbyin pa 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar bdag shin du med pa'i 
[\[255a.2\]]phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na sems can dang srog dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de dag shin du med pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[255a.3\]]sems can dang srog dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin du ma skyes pa'i phyir/_chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub 
[\[255a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos gang la skye ba med pa de la/_rtag pa dang chad pa med pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[255a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa shin du med pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[255a.6\]]dpa' chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur blta bar mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar lta ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[255a.7\]]pos rgyur blta bar mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar des de'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_phung po dang /_skye mched dang /_khams la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos de dag shin du med pa'i 
[\[255b.2\]]phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_phung po dang /_skye mched dang /_khams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/_
[\[255b.3\]]de ni 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya zhe na/_
[\[255b.4\]]de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum 
[\[255b.5\]]la brten pa dang gnas par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten pa dang gnas par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[255b.6\]]sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten pas/_sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la 
[\[255b.7\]]mngon par chags par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos su lta ba la brten pas/_chos mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di 
[\[256a.2\]]ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la brten pas/_dge 'dun mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[256a.3\]]sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la brten pas/_tshul khrims rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[256a.4\]]pos tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par mi bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ma yin gyis/_
[\[256a.5\]]rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya zhe na/_
[\[256a.6\]]de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa bas/_stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[256a.7\]]chen pos stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin zhe na/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]chen pos mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi byed pa'i phyir te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[256b.2\]]sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa yin zhe na/_de ni khams gsum thams cad du sems mi 'jug pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[256b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[256b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na/_snying rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_sems can thams cad la snying rje 
[\[256b.5\]]zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na/_byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[256b.6\]]chen pos sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya'o/_/de la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang zhe na/_chos thams cad la bsnan pa dang /_dbri ba med pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems 
[\[256b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta bas so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa gang zhe na/_chos thams cad tshul gcig tu rtogs kyang /_rtogs pa med pa de ni/_
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba la bzod pa gang zhe na/_chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_'gag 
[\[257a.2\]]pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bzod pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba la bzod pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/_ming dang gzugs mi skye ba 
[\[257a.3\]]shes pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang zhe na/_gnyis la yongs su rgyu ba med pa ste/_de ni byang 
[\[257a.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtogs pa yang dag par bsal ba gang zhe na/_chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/_de ni 
[\[257a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par spong ba ste/_de ni byang chub 
[\[257a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa gang zhe na/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i/_nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa ste/_de ni 
[\[257a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems gang zhe na/_khams gsum la dga' bar sems pa med pa ste/_de ni byang chub 
[\[257b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems gang zhe na/_dbang po drug yang dag par 'dus pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_zhi ba'i 
[\[257b.3\]]sems so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa med pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa med pa'i ye shes so/_/de la byang 
[\[257b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa gang zhe na/_skye mched drug gi btang snyoms te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[257b.5\]]chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba gang zhe na/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu lus ston pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[257b.6\]]chen po'i/_sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud pa gang zhe na/_sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rab tu shes pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 
[\[257b.7\]]shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par rtse zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/_sangs rgyas blta ba'i don du 'gro yang /_de la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rtse ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta ba gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na 'dug cing dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[258a.2\]]zhing mthong yang /_de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar 
[\[258a.3\]]mthong ba bzhin du yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gtong zhing /_des rlom sems 
[\[258a.4\]]su mi byed pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du bsgrub pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba gang zhe na/_sems can 
[\[258a.5\]]thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don du chos la bsnyen bkur ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa 
[\[258a.6\]]ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na/_chos kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa'o/_/de la byang chub 
[\[258a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa gang zhe na/_stobs bcu la gnas shing /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]chen po'i/_dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su sbyong 
[\[258b.2\]]ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas/_byang chub 
[\[258b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bya ba thams cad byed kyang /_de'i sems chos gang la yang mi 'jug pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_
[\[258b.4\]]yang dang yang mnyam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_yang dang yang mnyam par gzhag pa'o/_/de la 
[\[258b.5\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba/_ji lta ji ltar 'grub pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su grub pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams/_ji 
[\[258b.6\]]lta ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba/_de lta de ltar ched du bsams shing /_lus yongs su 'dzin pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba/_ji lta ji ltar 'grub pa/_de lta de ltar lus yongs su grub 
[\[258b.7\]]pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ched du 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/ji lta ji ltar smon pa/_de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba yin zhe na/_de la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[259a.2\]]dpa' chen po/_pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_ji lta ji ltar smon pa/_de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[259a.3\]]chen po/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes par bya ba khong du chud par bya ba yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud 
[\[259a.4\]]pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_sems can thams cad kyi skad shes par bya ba khong du chud pa'o/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan 
[\[259a.5\]]pa shes par bya ba rtogs pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes par bya ba rtogs pa'o/_/
[\[259a.6\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe rabs thams cad du rdzus shing skye ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[259a.7\]]dpa' chen po'i/_ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs chen por skye ba ste/_de ni 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 
[\[259b.2\]]'am/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_rgyud phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_
[\[259b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi rigs sngon gyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung bar gyur pa de'i rigs su skye ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_rus phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[259b.4\]]dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub la sems can rnams bkod cing byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la 
[\[259b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes ma thag tu/_'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/_de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed pa ste/_de ni byang chub 
[\[259b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_tshe phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu 'byung 
[\[259b.7\]]ba'i phyir/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang /_lhan cig tu mngon par 'byung zhing /_sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum la nges par 'byung ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_mngon par 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_byang chub 
[\[260a.2\]]kyi shing gi rtsa ba/_gser gyi rgyu las byung ba yin/_lhun bai DUr+yar 'jug pa yin/_yal ga rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin las grub pa yin/_me tog dang /_lo ma rin po che thams cad las gyur pa yin/_shing de'i dri zhim po dang /_'od 
[\[260a.3\]]bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa/_rgyas par 'geng ba yin te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_yon tan 
[\[260a.4\]]thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems 
[\[260a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/_sa bcu la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[260a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po/_gang gis pha rol du phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]
[\[260a.7\]]brgyad dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dag ste/_
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sa bcu la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/_/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu gang zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems 
[\[260b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_thabs mkhas pas/_pha rol du phyin pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[260b.3\]]rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon 
[\[260b.4\]]pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[260b.5\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/_dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/_rigs kyi sa dang /_brgyad pa'i sa dang /_mthong ba'i sa dang /_bsrabs pa'i sa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /_
[\[260b.6\]]byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa las yang dag par 'das te/_rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_sa dgu las yongs 
[\[260b.7\]]su 'das pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ste/_rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu pa'o/_/rab 'byor de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_theg pa chen po la yang dag 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]par zhugs par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor khyod kyis gang yang 'di skad du/_theg pa de gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa de ni/_de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_khams gsum nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa 
[\[261a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar/_theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang /_ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa yang ma 
[\[261a.3\]]yin/_gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par/_mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos ni 'byung ba'am/_'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/_byung 
[\[261a.4\]]bar gyur pa med de/_rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_chos kyi dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_de bzhin nyid 'byung bar 'dod 
[\[261a.5\]]du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_yang dag pa'i mtha' 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang /_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 
[\[261a.6\]]dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_nam mkha'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams/_'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_'dod 
[\[261a.7\]]chags zad pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams/_'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_rab tu byang ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i/_chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]pa de ni/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang /_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_'gog pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i 
[\[261b.2\]]chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_gzugs stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang /_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_'du shes stong pa nyid dang /_'du byed stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[261b.3\]]rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs stong pa nyid ni/_khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_'du shes stong pa nyid 
[\[261b.4\]]dang /_'du byed stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ba'i phyir ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang 'du 
[\[261b.5\]]byed dang rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_mig stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_rna ba stong 
[\[261b.6\]]pa nyid dang /_sna stong pa nyid dang /_lce stong pa nyid dang /_lus stong pa nyid dang /_yid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mig stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa 
[\[261b.7\]]med do/_/rna ba stong pa nyid dang /_sna stong pa nyid dang /_lce stong pa nyid dang /_lus stong pa nyid dang /_yid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mig mig gis stong 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid yid kyis stong ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni gzugs stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung 
[\[262a.2\]]bar 'dod pa de ni/_sgra stong pa nyid dang /_dri stong pa nyid dang /_ro stong pa nyid dang /_reg stong pa nyid dang /_chos stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[262a.3\]]du gnas pa med do/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang reg dang /_chos stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ba'i phyir ro/_/sgra dang dri dang ro dang 
[\[262a.4\]]reg dang /_chos chos kyis stong ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rna ba'i 
[\[262a.5\]]rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor mig gi rnam par 
[\[262a.6\]]shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[262a.7\]]yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rna ba'i rnam par 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa 
[\[262b.2\]]stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa 
[\[262b.3\]]nyid dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 
[\[262b.4\]]stong pa nyid dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa 
[\[262b.5\]]med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /_yid kyi 
[\[262b.6\]]'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid/_'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan 
[\[262b.7\]]nyid med pa'i chos rnams/_'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]pa nyid dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 
[\[263a.2\]]ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[263a.3\]]lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[263a.4\]]gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid 
[\[263a.5\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_rmi lam 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de 
[\[263a.6\]]ni/_sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rmi lam ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/sgyu ma dang 
[\[263a.7\]]smig rgyu dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rmi lam ni rmi lam gyis stong ba'i phyir ro/_/sgyu ma dang /_
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]smig rgyu dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang 
[\[263b.2\]]mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/
[\[263b.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[263b.4\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du 
[\[263b.5\]]phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[263b.6\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_phyi stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor 
[\[263b.7\]]gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_phyi nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]'byor nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni 
[\[264a.2\]]khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di 
[\[264a.3\]]ltar nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[264a.4\]]rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_
[\[264a.5\]]dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/
[\[264a.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_/dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 
[\[264a.7\]]'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 
[\[264b.2\]]'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid 
[\[264b.3\]]dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/bsam gtan rnams kyi 
[\[264b.4\]]ngo bo nyid dang /_tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[264b.5\]]smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[264b.6\]]bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid dang /_tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dgu'i ngo bo nyid dang /_stong ba nyid dang /_
[\[264b.7\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/_smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung bar 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams 
[\[265a.2\]]gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_
[\[265a.3\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par 
[\[265a.4\]]rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/mi 'jigs pa 
[\[265a.5\]]bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar de bzhin 
[\[265a.6\]]gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni/_sangs rgyas 
[\[265a.7\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa skye bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]rang sangs rgyas skye bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[265b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[265b.3\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid ni dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[265b.4\]]kyis stong ba'i phyir ro/_/rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 
[\[265b.5\]]'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 
[\[265b.6\]]dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_
[\[265b.7\]]phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]zhe na/_'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub dang /_lam 
[\[266a.2\]]gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_ming 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan 
[\[266a.3\]]nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_mtshan ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_brda 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod 
[\[266a.4\]]pa de ni/_tha snyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_gdags pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor ming stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[266a.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/mtshan ma stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/brda stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/tha snyad 
[\[266a.6\]]stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/gdags pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ming stong 
[\[266a.7\]]pa nyid ni ming stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/mtshan ma stong pa nyid mtshan ma stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/brda stong pa nyid brda stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/tha snyad stong pa nyid tha snyad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]gdags pa stong pa nyid gdags pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_skye ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/_
[\[266b.2\]]'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[266b.3\]]nyid du gnas pa med do/_/'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/_/
[\[266b.4\]]rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar skye ba med pa ni skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/'gag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni/_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong
