[\[295b.4\]]rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang /_sems can gang yin pa dang /_srog gang yin pa dang /_shes pa po gang yin pa dang /_mthong

[\[295b.6\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag 
[\[295b.7\]]par rig pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang yin pa dang /_nam mkha' gang yin pa dang /_theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /_mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang /_mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang /_mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang /_chos 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang /_dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir/_sems can med par rig par bya'o/_/sems can med pa'i phyir/_shes pa po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o/_/shes 
[\[296a.2\]]pa po med pa'i phyir/_mthong ba po med par rig par bya'o/_/mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med par rig par bya'o/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir/_rigs kyi sa med par rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi sa med pa'i phyir/_
[\[296a.3\]]brgyad pa'i sa med par rig par bya'o/_/brgyad pa'i sa med pa'i phyir/_mthong ba'i sa med par rig par bya'o/_/mthong ba'i sa med pa'i phyir/_bsrabs pa'i sa med par rig par bya'o/_/bsrabs pa'i sa med pa'i phyir/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med par 
[\[296a.4\]]rig par bya'o/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa med pa'i phyir/_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa med par rig par bya'o/_/byas pa rtogs pa'i sa med pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o/_/nam mkha' med pa'i phyir/_theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[296a.5\]]theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir/_mi 'jal ba med par rig par bya'o/_/mi 'jal ba med pa'i phyir/_mi 'grangs pa med par rig par bya'o/_/mi 'grangs pa med pa'i phyir/_mi dpogs pa med par rig par bya'o/_/mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad 
[\[296a.6\]]med par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang /_sems can gang yin pa dang /_srog gang yin pa dang /_shes pa po dang mthong 
[\[296a.7\]]ba po'i bar du gang yin pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /_rigs kyi sa gang yin pa dang /_brgyad pa'i sa gang yin pa dang /_mthong ba'i sa gang yin pa dang /_bsrabs pa'i sa gang yin pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa gang yin pa dang /_
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]byas pa rtogs pa'i sa gang yin pa dang /_nam mkha' gang yin pa dang /_theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /_mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang /_mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang /_mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang /_chos thams cad gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmigs su med

[\[296b.6\]]par rig par bya'o/_/mi dpogs pa med pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad med par rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang theg pa chen po de sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i go 'byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang /_

[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]pa dang /_dgra bcom pa gang yin pa dang /_nam mkha' gang yin pa dang /_theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /_mi 'jal ba gang yin pa dang /_mi 'grangs pa gang yin pa dang /_mi dpogs pa gang yin pa dang /_chos thams cad gang yin pa

[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]can grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa'i go 'byed do/_/de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang sems can grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa'i go 'byed do/_/rab 'byor nam mkha' ni sems can grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa'i go 'byed do/_/de bzhin

[\[298a.3\]]rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/_theg pa chen po de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba yang med de gnas pa yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni g.yo ba med pa ste/_de dag gang nas kyang 'ong ba med do/_/gang du yang 'dong ba med do/_/gar yang gnas par 
[\[298a.4\]]'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du

[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas 
[\[301a.2\]]par 'gyur ba med do/_/sa'i khams ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[301a.3\]]ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/chu'i khams dang /_
[\[301a.4\]]me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba 
[\[301a.5\]]med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar 
[\[301a.6\]]yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[301a.7\]]khams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/chu'i khams 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/ma rig pa ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar 
[\[301b.2\]]yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang /_len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang /_rga shi ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang 
[\[301b.3\]]gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang /_
[\[301b.4\]]reg pa dang tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang len pa dang /_srid pa dang skye ba dang /_rga shi'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba 
[\[301b.5\]]med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_
[\[301b.6\]]gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred 
[\[301b.7\]]pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang /_rga shi'i ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]'gyur ba med do/_/'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang /_rga shi'i mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba 
[\[302a.2\]]med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[302a.3\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol du 
[\[302a.4\]]phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin 
[\[302a.5\]]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur 
[\[302a.6\]]ba med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 
[\[302a.7\]]'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan 
[\[302b.2\]]nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes 
[\[302b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/nang stong pa nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/phyi stong pa nyid 
[\[302b.4\]]ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ni 
[\[302b.5\]]gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[302b.6\]]rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[302b.7\]]stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/phyi stong 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni/_gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni/_gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/
[\[303a.2\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid ni/_gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni/_gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang 
[\[303a.3\]]gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni/_gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas 
[\[303a.4\]]par 'gyur ba med do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 
[\[303a.5\]]'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang 
[\[303a.6\]]gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_
[\[303a.7\]]gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]gang du yang 'gro ba med gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[303b.2\]]lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba 
[\[303b.3\]]med do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_
[\[303b.4\]]gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang 
[\[303b.5\]]du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[303b.6\]]dang tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba 
[\[303b.7\]]med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 
[\[304a.2\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[304a.3\]]'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/rab 'byor

[\[304a.5\]]med do/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 
[\[304a.6\]]'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin

[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i

[\[304b.3\]]gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid dang 
[\[304b.4\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/rab 'byor byang chub ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang

[\[304b.6\]]nyid dang /_byang chub kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/rab 'byor sangs rgyas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[304b.7\]]zhe na/_rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/rab 'byor 'dus byas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi rang 
[\[305a.2\]]bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_'dus byas kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_
[\[305a.3\]]gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/rab 'byor 'dus ma byas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro 
[\[305a.4\]]ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/_gang du yang 'gro ba med/_gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/_/rab 'byor de 
[\[305a.5\]]ltar theg pa chen po de ni/_'ong ba med/_'gro ba yang med/_gnas pa yang med do/_/rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs so/_/phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/_dbus kyang mi dmigs te/_'di ni dus gsum 
[\[305a.6\]]mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa ste/_theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/zhes smras pa ni de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_theg pa 'di la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/_dbus kyang mi dmigs te/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces 
[\[305a.7\]]bya ba'i theg pa ste/_de'i phyir na theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong ngo /_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong ngo /_/da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]stong ngo /_/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong ngo /_/theg pa chen po de yang bka' 'gyur de yang stong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong ngo /_/rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gcig ces bya ba med do/_/gnyis 
[\[305b.2\]]sam gsum 'am bzhi 'am lnga 'am drug gam bdun nam brgyad dam dgu 'am bcu zhes bya ba med do/_/tha dad ces bya ba med do/_/de lta bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa ste/_de la mnyam pa dang 
[\[305b.3\]]mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/_/de la 'dod chags dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba yang mi dmigs so/_/zhe sdang dang zhe sdang med pa yang mi dmigs so/_/gti mug dang gti mug med pa yang mi dmigs so/_/ming dang ming med pa yang mi dmigs so/_/'dus 
[\[305b.4\]]byas dang 'dus ma byas kyang mi dmigs so/_/dge ba dang mi dge ba yang mi dmigs so/_/kha na ma tho ba yod pa dang kha na ma tho ba med pa yang mi dmigs so/_/zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa yang mi dmigs so/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_kun nas nyon 
[\[305b.5\]]mongs pa med pa yang mi dmigs so/_/'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa yang mi dmigs so/_/skye ba dang /_'gag pa yang mi dmigs so/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba yang mi dmigs so/_/de la rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa yang mi 
[\[305b.6\]]dmigs so/_/bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba yang mi dmigs so/_/bdag dang /_bdag med pa yang mi dmigs so/_/zhi ba dang /_ma zhi ba yang mi dmigs so/_/'dod pa'i khams dang /_'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so/_/gzugs 
[\[305b.7\]]kyi khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so/_/gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so/_/'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi dmigs 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/_rab 'byor 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang 'du byed dang 'das pa'i rnam par shes 
[\[306a.2\]]pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo /_/rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang 'du byed dang ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo /_/
[\[306a.3\]]rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la 'das 
[\[306a.4\]]pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/_stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/_stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang 'du byed dang stong pa nyid la 
[\[306a.5\]]'das pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/_stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/_stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs 
[\[306a.6\]]pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/_stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/_stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang stong pa nyid la ma 
[\[306a.7\]]'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/_stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/_stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_stong pa nyid la da ltar byung 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]ba'i gzugs dmigs su med do/_/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/_stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa 
[\[306b.2\]]dmigs su med do/_/stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/_stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi 
[\[306b.3\]]mthar mi dmigs/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid 
[\[306b.4\]]la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/_mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 
[\[306b.5\]]'ongs pa'i dus dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi 
[\[306b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[306b.7\]]na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/_mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs/_
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/_nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/_nang stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi 
[\[307a.2\]]dmigs/_nang stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/_mnyam 
[\[307a.3\]]pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni sngon gyi mthar mi 
[\[307a.4\]]dmigs/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 
[\[307a.5\]]'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/_mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci 
[\[307a.6\]]zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni da 
[\[307a.7\]]ltar byung bar mi dmigs/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/_mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_
[\[307b.2\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/_
[\[307b.3\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 
[\[307b.4\]]'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/_mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs 
[\[307b.5\]]pa lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam 
[\[307b.6\]]par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par 
[\[307b.7\]]rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/_mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 
[\[308a.2\]]dus mi dmigs te/_mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/_mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/_rab 'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi 
[\[308a.3\]]mthar mi dmigs/_so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/_so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/_so so'i skye bo ni/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[308a.4\]]gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/_nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/_nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/_nyan thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor 
[\[308a.5\]]gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/_rang sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/_rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/_rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can dmigs 
[\[308a.6\]]su med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/_byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/_byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/_byang chub sems dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la 
[\[308a.7\]]mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]mi dmigs/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can dmigs su med pa'i 
[\[308b.2\]]phyir ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/_rab 'byor 'di 
[\[308b.3\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste/_de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/_rnam pa thams 
[\[308b.4\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa 
[\[308b.5\]]nyid ces bgyi ba 'di legs par gsungs pa ni legs shing dge ba ste/_bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing /_'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo/_/bcom 
[\[308b.6\]]ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[308b.7\]]khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/_dpag tu ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis pa rnams kyang /_theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]'das de'i slad du dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 
[\[309a.2\]]'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs shing /_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes par gyur to/_/brnyes 
[\[309a.3\]]so/_/brnyes par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gnas 
[\[309a.4\]]brtan rab 'byor 'di ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bsko ba mdzad pas/_'di ni theg pa chen po bstan pa tsam du sems so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom 
[\[309a.5\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur lags grang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ltar gyur pa med de/_rab 'byor khyod ni 
[\[309a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang rjes su 'thun par theg pa chen po ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos gang yang rung ste/_nyan thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[309a.7\]]de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud pa de lta bu'i nyan 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]thos kyi chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di lta ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[309b.2\]]gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa 
[\[309b.3\]]dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[309b.4\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams 
[\[309b.5\]]cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dang /_
[\[309b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang /_rtag tu btang snyoms kyi rnam par spyod pa ste/_rab 'byor de dag ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i nang du 'du zhing khongs su chud par 'dod 
[\[309b.7\]]pa ste/_nyan thos kyi chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[310a.2\]]gang yin pa dang /_gzugs gang yin pa dang /_tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_'du shes gang yin pa dang /_'du byed gang yin pa dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_mig gang yin pa dang /_gzugs gang yin pa dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin 
[\[310a.3\]]pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_rna ba gang yin pa dang /_sgra gang yin pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_rna ba'i 
[\[310a.4\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_sna gang yin pa dang /_dri gang yin pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_lce gang yin pa 
[\[310a.5\]]dang /_ro gang yin pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_lus gang yin pa dang /_reg gang yin pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa 
[\[310a.6\]]dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_yid gang yin pa dang /_chos gang yin pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus 
[\[310a.7\]]te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /_ma rig pa gang yin pa dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi gang yin pa dang /_
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang yin pa dang /_
[\[310b.2\]]nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang /_
[\[310b.3\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang /_dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang /_stobs rnams gang yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa dang /_
[\[310b.4\]]bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa dang /_tshad med pa rnams gang yin pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug gang yin pa dang /_zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang yin pa dang /_
[\[310b.5\]]rgyas pa'i skye mched bcu gang yin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang /_sdug bsngal gang yin pa dang /_kun 'byung ba gang yin pa dang /_'gog pa gang yin pa dang /_
[\[310b.6\]]lam gang yin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa gang yin pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang yin pa dang /_mi 
[\[310b.7\]]'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang /_snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad gang yin pa dang /_'dod pa'i khams gang yin pa dang /_gzugs kyi khams gang yin 
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams gang yin pa dang /_dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang /_mi dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang yin pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i chos gang yin pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i chos gang yin pa 
[\[311a.2\]]dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang yin pa dang /_'dus byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos gang yin pa dang /_'dul ba gang yin pa dang /_chos 
[\[311a.3\]]kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi ldan pa 
[\[311a.4\]]yang ma yin te/_gzugs med pa/_bstan tu med pa/_thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/_rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis na/_khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun par theg pa chen po ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[311a.5\]]theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/_de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[311a.6\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/_de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis 
[\[311a.7\]]su byar med do/_/theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/_nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/_de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/_de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis 
[\[311b.2\]]su byar med do/_/theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[311b.3\]]brgyad pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/_de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[311b.4\]]lag brgyad pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par 
[\[311b.5\]]thar ba dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan zhes 
[\[311b.6\]]bya ba med de/_de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan/_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs 
[\[311b.7\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/_de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]bstan par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang byang chub sems 
[\[312a.2\]]dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su mi dmigs te/_gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o/_/tshor ba 
[\[312a.3\]]dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi ste/_gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang 
[\[312a.4\]]rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis mi dmigs te/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad/_rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste ma dmigs na/_byang chub 
[\[312a.5\]]sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/_byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril gyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gdams 
[\[312a.6\]]shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du bas te/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi yang bdag la mngon par 'grub pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[312a.7\]]dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi yang /_byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par 'grub pa ma mchis so/_/de ltar rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la gang mngon par 'grub pa'i gzugs lta yang ga la zhig mchis/_gang mngon par 'grub pa'i 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa lta yang ga la zhig mchis/_bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni/_gzugs ma lags/_gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ma lags te/_bcom 
[\[312b.2\]]ldan 'das de lta lags la/_mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang gang byang chub tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis na mngon par ma grub pa mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gdams su 
[\[312b.3\]]mchis sam/_gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum/_yongs su mi 'jum/_'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing /_yid mi 'jigs/_mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 
[\[312b.4\]]ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mthar dmigs su med pa yin/_
[\[312b.5\]]phyi ma'i mthar dmigs su med pa yin/_dbus su dmigs su med pa yin/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du 
[\[312b.6\]]byed dang /_rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/_tshor ba dang 
[\[312b.7\]]'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_de skad du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_de skad du 
[\[313a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril gyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[313a.3\]]ci'i phyir na/_de skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du bas so zhes smra/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_de skad du ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi ba yang /_bdag ni mngon par grub 
[\[313a.4\]]pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba yang /_byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/_/de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin la/_gzugs mngon 
[\[313a.5\]]par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa mngon par grub pa lta yang gang zhig mchis/_gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/_/gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du 
[\[313a.6\]]byed dang rnam par shes pa ma lags so/_/zhes smra/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_de skad du mngon par ma grub pa zhig mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'am zhes smra/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 
[\[313a.7\]]'byor ci'i phyir na/_de skad du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba dmigs su ma mchis so zhes smra/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_de skad du gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum/_yongs su mi 'jum/_'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing /_yid mi 'jigs mi sngang skrag par mi 'gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de la spyod do zhes smra/_de skad 
[\[313b.2\]]ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/sems can stong pa dang /_sems 
[\[313b.3\]]can dben pa dang /_sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/sems can stong pa dang /_sems can 
[\[313b.4\]]dben pa dang /_sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/sems can stong pa dang /_sems can 
[\[313b.5\]]dben pa dang /_sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can med pa dang /_sems can stong pa dang /_sems can dben pa dang /_sems can rang 
[\[313b.6\]]bzhin med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so/_/dbus su mi dmigs so/_/sems can med pa yang gzhan/_sems can stong ba yang gzhan/_sems can dben pa yang gzhan/_sems can rang bzhin med pa yang gzhan zhig yin 
[\[313b.7\]]la/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhig ste/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan/_dbus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sems can med pa gang yin pa dang /_sems can stong ba gang 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]yin pa dang /_sems can dben pa gang yin pa dang /_sems can rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin 
[\[314a.2\]]pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/_
[\[314a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[314a.4\]]sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/gzugs dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/

[\[314a.6\]]chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi 
[\[314a.7\]]dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/gzugs dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ngo bo
