[\[314b.4\]]chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba 
[\[314b.5\]]dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa med pa dang /_gzugs 
[\[314b.6\]]dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dben pa dang /_gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi 
[\[314b.7\]]dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs te/_gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang dben pa dang ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang dben pa 
[\[315a.2\]]dang ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched 
[\[315a.3\]]dang /_khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/skye mched 
[\[315a.4\]]dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/skye mched 
[\[315a.5\]]dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/skye mched dang /_khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/skye 
[\[315a.6\]]mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/
[\[315a.7\]]skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/
[\[315b.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dben pa dang ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs te/_skye mched 
[\[315b.3\]]dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_
[\[315b.4\]]dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_skye mched dang khams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon 
[\[315b.5\]]gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs 
[\[315b.6\]]so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs 
[\[315b.7\]]so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/tshul 
[\[316a.2\]]khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/
[\[316a.3\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_
[\[316a.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod 
[\[316a.5\]]pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa stong pa 
[\[316a.6\]]nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du 
[\[316a.7\]]phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang 
[\[316b.2\]]chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang 
[\[316b.3\]]chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du 
[\[316b.4\]]phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs 
[\[316b.5\]]so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs 
[\[316b.6\]]so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du 
[\[316b.7\]]phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs 
[\[317a.2\]]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab 
[\[317a.3\]]kyi pha rol du phyin pa med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod 
[\[317a.4\]]pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med pa dang stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang 
[\[317a.5\]]gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[317a.6\]]du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_
[\[317a.7\]]sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar 
[\[317b.2\]]du stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[317b.3\]]sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/nang 
[\[317b.4\]]stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[317b.5\]]dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/dngos 
[\[317b.6\]]po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ngo bo nyid med 
[\[317b.7\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs 
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]so/_/nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa 
[\[318a.2\]]nyid dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus 
[\[318a.3\]]su mi dmigs so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[318a.4\]]bar du med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs te/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang /_stong pa nyid 
[\[318a.5\]]dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_nang 
[\[318a.6\]]stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa 
[\[318a.7\]]dang /_dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis 
[\[318b.2\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs 
[\[318b.3\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_
[\[318b.4\]]dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar ba dang /_mthar 
[\[318b.5\]]gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_
[\[318b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_
[\[318b.7\]]dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar ba dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_
[\[319a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[319a.3\]]rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis 
[\[319a.4\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_
[\[319a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[319a.6\]]rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas 
[\[319a.7\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_
[\[319b.2\]]dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[319b.3\]]'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[319b.4\]]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang 
[\[319b.5\]]stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong 
[\[319b.6\]]pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir/_
[\[319b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang 
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[320a.2\]]'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[320a.3\]]ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_
[\[320a.4\]]stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar ba dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong 
[\[320a.5\]]pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[320a.6\]]sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam 
[\[320a.7\]]dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye 
[\[320b.2\]]bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[320b.3\]]dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[320b.4\]]dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[320b.5\]]sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad 
[\[320b.6\]]med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar ba dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[320b.7\]]gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam 
[\[321a.2\]]gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[321a.3\]]dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus 
[\[321a.4\]]mi dmigs te/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[321a.5\]]tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[321a.6\]]gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon 
[\[321a.7\]]gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du med pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang chos kyi 
[\[321b.2\]]dbyings med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/chos 
[\[321b.3\]]kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/chos 
[\[321b.4\]]kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/chos 
[\[321b.5\]]kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/
[\[321b.6\]]chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/chos kyi 
[\[321b.7\]]dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/chos kyi 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]dbyings dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/
[\[322a.2\]]chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/
[\[322a.3\]]chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/chos kyi dbyings stong pa 
[\[322a.4\]]nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir/_
[\[322a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[322a.6\]]sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_chos kyi 
[\[322a.7\]]dbyings med pa dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa 
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs te/_chos kyi dbyings med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa 
[\[322b.2\]]yang gzhan ma yin/_chos kyi dbyings dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_
[\[322b.3\]]sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_chos kyi dbyings med pa gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam 
[\[322b.4\]]gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa gang yin pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[322b.5\]]gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang nyan thos med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[322b.6\]]sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/nyan thos stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/nyan thos stong pa 
[\[322b.7\]]nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/nyan thos med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/nyan thos stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos med pa dang /_nyan thos stong pa nyid dang /_nyan thos dben pa dang /_nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[323a.2\]]mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs te/_nyan thos med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_nyan thos stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[323a.3\]]yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_nyan thos med pa gang yin pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang 
[\[323a.4\]]yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[323a.5\]]dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi 
[\[323a.6\]]dmigs so/_/rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/rang sangs rgyas 
[\[323a.7\]]stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang sangs rgyas med pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas dben pa dang /_rang 
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs te/_rang sangs rgyas med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang 
[\[323b.2\]]chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_rang sangs rgyas med pa gang yin pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas stong pa 
[\[323b.3\]]nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar 
[\[323b.4\]]med do//_//shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/_bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi 
[\[323b.5\]]dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/byang 
[\[323b.6\]]chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems 
[\[323b.7\]]dpa' stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs te/_byang chub sems dpa' med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa yang 
[\[324a.2\]]gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' med pa gang yin pa 
[\[324a.3\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[324a.4\]]gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_
[\[324a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[324a.6\]]dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs 
[\[324a.7\]]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_thams cad mkhyen pa med pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs te/_thams 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[324b.2\]]yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_thams cad mkhyen pa med pa gang yin pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[324b.3\]]dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[324b.4\]]sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus su mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par 
[\[324b.5\]]bya'o/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam/_tshor ba dang 'du shes 
[\[324b.6\]]dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' 
[\[324b.7\]]yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /_
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus mi dmigs te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam 
[\[325a.2\]]grangs des na/_gzugs kun tu mtha' yas/_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched rnams dang /_
[\[325a.3\]]khams rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang /_stong pa nyid thams cad dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms 
[\[325a.4\]]par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs 
[\[325a.5\]]bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar dper na/_nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_
[\[325a.6\]]phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes ming du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[325a.7\]]ma 'dres pa rnams sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs/_tshor ba dang 'du 
[\[325b.2\]]shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs shes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /_tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni rnam par 
[\[325b.3\]]shes pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la gzugs med/_stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' med/_stong pa nyid la tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa med/_stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[325b.4\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra 
[\[325b.5\]]dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[325b.6\]]du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa med/_byang chub 
[\[325b.7\]]sems dpa' med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/phyi stong pa nyid dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_dngos 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[326a.2\]]gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags 
[\[326a.3\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med/_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi 
[\[326a.4\]]yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad med pa rnams dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad 
[\[326a.5\]]dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[326a.6\]]stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_sangs 
[\[326a.7\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong /_de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong /_thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/_de ci'i 
[\[326b.2\]]phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la chos kyi dbyings dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong /_sangs rgyas 
[\[326b.3\]]kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong /_nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong /_rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa med/_sangs rgyas 
[\[326b.4\]]kyi theg pa'i bar du med/_nyan thos med/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar du med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang 'du 
[\[326b.5\]]shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmigs 
[\[326b.6\]]na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni gang zhig_/shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gang zhig la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bya zhes zer ba/_ci'i phyir de skad du smra zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzugs ni 
[\[326b.7\]]tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba ni tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzugs dang /_tshor ba ni 'du shes la med cing /_mi dmigs so/_/'du shes ni 'du shes la med cing mi dmigs so/_/'du 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]shes ni gzugs dang /_tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/_/'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/_/'du byed rnams

[\[327a.3\]]pa ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/rna ba ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/rna ba ni 
[\[327a.4\]]mig la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig dang rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so/_/sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so/_/sna ni mig dang rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig dang rna ba dang sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lce ni lce la med cing mi 
[\[327a.5\]]dmigs so/_/lce ni mig dang rna ba dang /_sna la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lus ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce la med cing mi dmigs so/_/
[\[327a.6\]]mig dang rna ba dang sna dang /_lce dang lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so/_/yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so/_/yid ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzugs ni sgra la med 
[\[327a.7\]]cing mi dmigs so/_/sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so/_/sgra ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzugs dang sgra ni dri la med cing mi dmigs so/_/dri ni dri la med cing mi dmigs so/_/dri ni gzugs dang sgra la med cing mi dmigs so/_gzugs 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]dang sgra dang dri ni ro la med cing mi dmigs so/_/ro ni ro la med cing mi dmigs so/_/ro ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so/_/reg ni reg la med cing mi dmigs so/_/reg ni gzugs 
[\[327b.2\]]dang /_sgra dang dri dang ro la med cing mi dmigs so/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so/_/chos ni chos la med cing mi dmigs so/_/chos ni gzugs dang /_sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi

[\[327b.6\]]rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam 
[\[327b.7\]]par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]par shes pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_

[\[328a.3\]]rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 
[\[328a.4\]]'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni/_

[\[328b.1\]]'dus te reg pa ni/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/

[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las

[\[329a.3\]]dmigs so/_/mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor 
[\[329a.4\]]ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_

[\[329a.6\]]byu nga ba'i tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/yid kyi

[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la med

[\[329b.5\]]med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni/_yang dag par spong ba la med cing mi 
[\[329b.6\]]dmigs so/_/lam gyi bar ni lam la med cing mi dmigs so/_/lam ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag la med cing mi dmigs so/_/

[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad med pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par
